original: gal te yang 'dod par bya ba yin pa'i phyir mtho ris ni bsgrub bya nyid yin la skyes bu'i bya ba'i bye brag yin pa'i phyir mchod sbyin ni sgrub byed nyid yin par sngar rtogs pa yin yang /
analyzed: gal te yang 'dod par bya ba yin pa'i phyir mtho ris ni bsgrub bya nyid yin la skyes bu'i bya ba'i bye brag yin pa'i phyir mchod sbyin ni sgrub byed nyid yin par sngar rtogs pa yin yang /
translated: The object of engagement is the object of engagement that is engaged by the object of engagement itself, because it is engaged by the object of engagement itself.

original: 'di dag phan tshun 'brel pa'am /üîΩrang bzhin gcig pa'i 'brel pa yang rung ba sngon du mngon sum las sam /
analyzed: 'di dag phan tshun 'brel pa'am /üîΩrang bzhin gcig pa'i 'brel pa yang rung ba sngon du mngon sum las sam /
translated: The object of engagement is the object of engagement that is engaged

original: gzhan las kyang rtogs pa ma yin te /
analyzed: gzhan las kyang rtogs pa ma yin te /
translated: It is not understood from another,

original: de nyid kyis na 'dod pa tsam gyis bsdus pa'i tshig gi don rnams kyi tshogs pa 'di ni 'khrul pa yin te /
analyzed: de nyid kyis na 'dod pa tsam gyis bsdus pa'i tshig gi don rnams kyi tshogs pa 'di ni 'khrul pa yin te /
translated: because of that, this collection of words and meanings included by mere desire is mistaken,

original: mo gsham gyi bu 'gro ba bzhin du snang ba tsam yin no //
analyzed: mo gsham gyi bu 'gro ba bzhin du snang ba tsam yin no //
translated: like the mere appearance of the son of a barren woman going.

original: skyes bus byas pa ma yin pa la bsdus pa ma yin par ji ltar shes pa yin zhe na /
analyzed: skyes bus byas pa ma yin pa la bsdus pa ma yin par ji ltar shes pa yin zhe na /
translated: How is it known that it is not included in what is not made by a person?

original: tshig gi don rnams ni 'jig rten gyi rjes su 'brangs nas rtogs pa nyid ni bsdus pa rtogs pa'i rgyu mtshan nyid yin gyi /
analyzed: tshig gi don rnams ni 'jig rten gyi rjes su 'brangs nas rtogs pa nyid ni bsdus pa rtogs pa'i rgyu mtshan nyid yin gyi /
translated: The meanings of the words are understood by following the world, and that is the characteristic of the cause of understanding the included.

original: rig byed skyes bus byas pa ma yin pa ni ma yin te /
analyzed: rig byed skyes bus byas pa ma yin pa ni ma yin te /
translated: It is not that the Vedas are not made by a person,

original: don gyi bye brag la rjes su sbyor ba ma yin pa'i phyir zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: don gyi bye brag la rjes su sbyor ba ma yin pa'i phyir zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: because they are not applied to specific meanings.

original: thams cad du zhes bya ba ni skyes bus byas pa'am skyes bu byas pa min pa yang zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: thams cad du zhes bya ba ni skyes bus byas pa'am skyes bu byas pa min pa yang zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: Everywhere means both made by a person and not made by a person.

original: byed pa por rtogs pa zhes bya ba ni mthong ba'i rjes su 'jug pa'i tshig gi don rtogs pa yin gyi /
analyzed: byed pa por rtogs pa zhes bya ba ni mthong ba'i rjes su 'jug pa'i tshig gi don rtogs pa yin gyi /
translated: The phrase ‚Äúrealization of the agent‚Äù means the realization of the meaning of a word that is used in conformity with what is seen.

original: 'dus pa'i bye brag ni ma yin te /
analyzed: 'dus pa'i bye brag ni ma yin te /
translated: It does not refer to a particular collection of things,

original: de la mngon sum la sogs pa'i tshad ma mi 'jug pas so zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: de la mngon sum la sogs pa'i tshad ma mi 'jug pas so zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: because direct perception and the other means of valid cognition do not apply to that.

original: byed pa po nyid la sogs pa rnams kyi yang tshig don @52a * //
analyzed: byed pa po nyid la sogs pa rnams kyi yang tshig don @52a * //
translated: The meaning of the words ‚Äúagent‚Äù and so on is also taught to be the object of direct perception and the other means of valid cognition.üîΩThe statement that they are not used in conformity with what is seen is taught in order to show that the object of direct perception and the other means of valid cognition is not the agent and so on.

original: du bstan pa ni mngon sum la sogs pa'i yul nyid yin pa'i phyir sngar mthong ba'i rjes su 'jug pa can ma yin par bstan pa ni mngon sum las ni sngar byed pa po nyid du rtogs pa yang ma yin te zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: du bstan pa ni mngon sum la sogs pa'i yul nyid yin pa'i phyir sngar mthong ba'i rjes su 'jug pa can ma yin par bstan pa ni mngon sum las ni sngar byed pa po nyid du rtogs pa yang ma yin te zhes bya ba'o //

analyzed: byed pa po nyid kyi yan lag gi brda 'dzin pa yang ma yin la /

original: 'dzud byed la sogs pa ni bye brag yin te /
analyzed: 'dzud byed la sogs pa ni bye brag yin te /

analyzed: thu yu lta bu ma yin nam ling gi don ni spyi yin te ba lang nyid lta bu'o //
translated: Is it not like a bull? The meaning of linga is universal, like cowness.üîΩAnd that is stated:

original: de yang / 'jug byed nyid ni sgra yi don //
analyzed: de yang / 'jug byed nyid ni sgra yi don //

original: thams cad du ni ma bor phyir //üîΩzhes smos pa'o //

original: sgra rnams kyi phyi rol gyi don la de ma yin pa las log pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba'i dgongs pa'o //
analyzed: sgra rnams kyi phyi rol gyi don la de ma yin pa las log pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba'i dgongs pa'o //

analyzed: gsol ba 'debs pa la sogs pa rnams kyis gnod bzhin pa yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //

analyzed: yang na / de ma rtogs pa zhes bya ba ni pags pa can du phyugs nyid la bye brag med kyang /
translated: Or, ‚ÄúIf that is not understood‚Äù means that although cattle are not distinguished in terms of having skin,

analyzed: rig byed la ni skyes bu med pas bsam pa med pa'i phyir de'i @55b bye brag nges par sbyor ba nyid med ces bya ba'i don to //

analyzed: da ni 'jug par 'dod pa'i bsam pa can gyi yul yang 'bras bu'i bya ba byed pa'i go skabs kyi ngo bo de'i tshe med de /

analyzed: zhes bya ba smos te /

analyzed: skyes bus byas pa yang don dang 'brel pa ma yin pas /

analyzed: de yang tshig gi don gyi sgo nas skyes bu blo nyid kyi bya ba yin no //

analyzed: rig byed ni tshig dang ngag gi bdag nyid can nyid kyi nye ba yin la /

analyzed: 'byung bar 'gyur ba la 'brel pa 'dzin pa yang med pa yin zhes bya ba'i don to //

original: ltar skye zhe na /
analyzed: ltar skye zhe na /

original: sgra ni blo don zhes bya ba smos te /
analyzed: sgra ni blo don zhes bya ba smos te /

original: de nyid gsal bar byed pa ni /

analyzed: 'di ltar bdag gis rtogs zhes bya ba la sogs pas 'chad pa po dang nyan pa po'i zhen pa'i dbang gis te /

analyzed: sgra las byung ba'i sgra'i don gyi rjes su dpag pa nyid yin gyi gzhan gyi don gyi rjes su dpag pa ni ma yin te /

original: 'brel ba can yang mthong ba nyid la sogs pa'i spyi dang 'gal ba khyab par mi dmigs pa ni nye bar bzhag pa la the tshom za ba'i rgyu mtshan yin par bstan pa ni /
analyzed: 'brel ba can yang mthong ba nyid la sogs pa'i spyi dang 'gal ba khyab par mi dmigs pa ni nye bar bzhag pa la the tshom za ba'i rgyu mtshan yin par bstan pa ni /
translated: The non-observation of a pervasion that is contradictory with the universal of being seen, etc. is taught to be the reason for doubt regarding the object that is present.üîΩThis is taught by

original: spyi de nyid ces bya ba'o //
analyzed: spyi de nyid ces bya ba'o //
translated: ‚ÄúThat universal itself.‚Äù

original: thams cad mkhyen pa la sogs pa bzhin du khyad par med pa'i dmigs pa tsam ni yod pa dang med pa thun mong ba yin pa'i phyir the tshom gyi rgyu mtshan yin gyi /
analyzed: thams cad mkhyen pa la sogs pa bzhin du khyad par med pa'i dmigs pa tsam ni yod pa dang med pa thun mong ba yin pa'i phyir the tshom gyi rgyu mtshan yin gyi /
translated: A mere object of observation that is not differentiated, like the Omniscient One, etc., is a reason for doubt because it is common to both existence and non-existence.

original: spyi ni mngon sum nyid ma yin par bstan pa ni /
analyzed: spyi ni mngon sum nyid ma yin par bstan pa ni /
translated: The teaching that a universal is not a direct perception is

original: spyir mi dmigs pa zhes bya ba la sogs pas so //
analyzed: spyir mi dmigs pa zhes bya ba la sogs pas so //
translated: ‚ÄúNon-observation of a universal is not a reason for doubt.‚Äù

original: dmigs pa'i rigs byar gyur pa zhes bya ba 'dis ni bye brag med pa'i mi dmigs pa'i med pa smra ba yin no //
analyzed: dmigs pa'i rigs byar gyur pa zhes bya ba 'dis ni bye brag med pa'i mi dmigs pa'i med pa smra ba yin no //
translated: ‚ÄúThe object of observation is a possible object‚Äù teaches that non-observation without differentiation is a reason for doubt.

original: khyad par gyi nges pa ma bzung ba'i dran pa nyid ni the tshom za ba yin no zhes zer ba ni khyad par dran pa'i phyir zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: khyad par gyi nges pa ma bzung ba'i dran pa nyid ni the tshom za ba yin no zhes zer ba ni khyad par dran pa'i phyir zhes bya ba'o //
translated: This is what is said: ‚Äúbecause of the memory of a particular.‚Äù

original: khyad par dran pa la sogs pa'i tshogs pa las byung ba yin par de la bye brag med pa'i phyir zhes bstan pa ni /
analyzed: khyad par dran pa la sogs pa'i tshogs pa las byung ba yin par de la bye brag med pa'i phyir zhes bstan pa ni /
translated: Since it is not different from the collection of memory of a particular and so on, it is taught that it is not different from that.

original: khyad par dran pa las the tshom gzhan ma yin te zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: khyad par dran pa las the tshom gzhan ma yin te zhes bya ba'o //
translated: Doubt is not different from the memory of a particular.

original: de'i khyad par nges par ma bzung ba'i phyir spyi yin par bstan pa ni /
analyzed: de'i khyad par nges par ma bzung ba'i phyir spyi yin par bstan pa ni /
translated: Since it does not apprehend a particular, it is taught that it is a universal.

original: de'i phyir byed pa zhes bya ba de nyid ces bya ba ste /
analyzed: de'i phyir byed pa zhes bya ba de nyid ces bya ba ste /
translated: Therefore, it is said that it is the same as that.

original: khyad par nges pa ma bzung ba thun mong gi tshig yin par dgongs pa'o zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: khyad par nges pa ma bzung ba thun mong gi tshig yin par dgongs pa'o zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The meaning is that it is a common expression for not apprehending a particular.

original: yul nges pa can ma yin pa'i mi dmigs pa tsam las ni nges par bzung ba med pa yin la /
analyzed: yul nges pa can ma yin pa'i mi dmigs pa tsam las ni nges par bzung ba med pa yin la /
translated: From mere non-apprehension, which does not have a determined object, there is no determination.

original: yul nges can ni spyi mngon sum du gyur pa nyid las ma yin snyam du sems pa la /
analyzed: yul nges can ni spyi mngon sum du gyur pa nyid las ma yin snyam du sems pa la /
translated: But from a determined object, it is not just the perception of a universal.

original: la lar ni dngos po @60b dang dngos po med pa'i zhes bya ba smos te /
analyzed: la lar ni dngos po @60b dang dngos po med pa'i zhes bya ba smos te /
translated: In some cases, it is called the non-apprehension of an existent or non-existent entity.

original: snang ba mi gsal ba'am thag ring ba la yang rnam pa mi gsal ba yin la /
analyzed: snang ba mi gsal ba'am thag ring ba la yang rnam pa mi gsal ba yin la /
translated: In some cases, it is called the non-apprehension of a distant or obscure entity.

original: de'i gnas skabs kyi mi snang ba'i bye brag gis dpen pa'i blo 'di nyid ni mi dmigs pa yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: de'i gnas skabs kyi mi snang ba'i bye brag gis dpen pa'i blo 'di nyid ni mi dmigs pa yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The meaning is that this very cognition of emptiness is non-apprehension due to the distinction of non-appearance in that situation.

original: sa phyogs la sogs pa 'ga' zhig tu mi snang ba'i dngos po sa dpen pa dmigs pa'i dngos po yang mi dmigs pa yin par bstan pa ni /
analyzed: sa phyogs la sogs pa 'ga' zhig tu mi snang ba'i dngos po sa dpen pa dmigs pa'i dngos po yang mi dmigs pa yin par bstan pa ni /
translated: In some places, such as in the earth, the non-appearance of an entity is the non-apprehension of an entity that is the object of apprehension.

original: dmigs par bya ba'i don gyi rang bzhin zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: dmigs par bya ba'i don gyi rang bzhin zhes bya ba ste /
translated: The meaning of the object of apprehension is the nature of an entity.

original: ma 'khrul pa nyid kyi du ba dang me bzhin du spyi las bye brag rtogs pa yin no //
analyzed: ma 'khrul pa nyid kyi du ba dang me bzhin du spyi las bye brag rtogs pa yin no //
translated: Like smoke and fire, the particular is understood from the general.

original: gal te sngon po dmigs pa yod na de'i ming dran pa las sngon po'i zhes bya ba'i rnam par rtogs pa yin pa de bzhin du /
analyzed: gal te sngon po dmigs pa yod na de'i ming dran pa las sngon po'i zhes bya ba'i rnam par rtogs pa yin pa de bzhin du /
translated: If the apprehension of blue exists, then the conceptualization of blue arises from the memory of its name.

original: nges pa ma bzung ba'i dmigs pa la de'i ming la sogs pa dran pa las /üîΩmtho yor yin pa'am /
analyzed: nges pa ma bzung ba'i dmigs pa la de'i ming la sogs pa dran pa las / mtho yor yin pa'am /
translated: The mind that is not certain about the object, but is a conception of that object as a man, etc., on the basis of memory of its name, etc.,üîΩis a mind that is not certain about a post,

original: gzhan yin pa'i rnam par rtog pa'i yid ni nges par gzung ba med par 'byung ba yin no //
analyzed: gzhan yin pa'i rnam par rtog pa'i yid ni nges par gzung ba med par 'byung ba yin no //
translated: or about anything else.

original: ma yin te /
analyzed: ma yin te /
translated: No, it is not.

original: dang po nyid ni de'i ming la sogs pa dran pa med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: dang po nyid ni de'i ming la sogs pa dran pa med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because at the very beginning there is no memory of its name, etc.

original: dang po yang nges par gzung ba med par khyad par ma dran pa'i yul de la ji ltar 'gyur ba yin /üîΩkhyad par dran pa yin na 'gyur ro zhe na /
analyzed: dang po yang nges par gzung ba med par khyad par ma dran pa'i yul de la ji ltar 'gyur ba yin / khyad par dran pa yin na 'gyur ro zhe na /
translated: And how can the mind be uncertain about the object, without memory of its distinguishing features?üîΩIf it is memory of the distinguishing features, then it is not uncertainty.

original: de nyid khyad par dran pa nges par gzung ba med na the tshom za ba ma yin nam /
analyzed: de nyid khyad par dran pa nges par gzung ba med na the tshom za ba ma yin nam /
translated: But is not memory of the distinguishing features itself uncertain, if it is not certain?

original: de las gzhan pa ni ma yin te /
analyzed: de las gzhan pa ni ma yin te /
translated: It is not uncertain about that,

original: 'di ni khyad par nges pa ma bzung ba'i bdag nyid yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: 'di ni khyad par nges pa ma bzung ba'i bdag nyid yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because it is the nature of memory of the distinguishing features not to be uncertain.

original: des na khyad par dran pa dang lhan cig pa'i dbang po sa de yin pa ni mi rigs te /
analyzed: des na khyad par dran pa dang lhan cig pa'i dbang po sa de yin pa ni mi rigs te /
translated: Therefore, it is not reasonable that the mind is the sense faculty when it is accompanied by memory of the distinguishing features.

original: de nyid khyad par dran pa nges par gzung ba med par ci las 'byung ba yin /
analyzed: de nyid khyad par dran pa nges par gzung ba med par ci las 'byung ba yin /
translated: How can it arise without the memory of its specific characteristics?

original: khyad par gnyis thun mong ba'i ngo bo nyid dmigs pa las yin te /
analyzed: khyad par gnyis thun mong ba'i ngo bo nyid dmigs pa las yin te /
translated: It arises from the perception of the nature common to the two specific characteristics.

original: rtag pa dang mi rtag pa dag gzhal bya yin pa lta bu'o //
analyzed: rtag pa dang mi rtag pa dag gzhal bya yin pa lta bu'o //
translated: For example, permanence and impermanence are the objects of the two cognitions.

original: de lta mod kyi mthon po ma yin pa las log par ni nges pa can yin la /
analyzed: de lta mod kyi mthon po ma yin pa las log par ni nges pa can yin la /
translated: But the cognition is certain with regard to the absence of non-height,

original: mtho yor la sogs pa'i bye brag nges par ma bzung ba ni dran pa'i rgyur 'gyur ba yin no //
analyzed: mtho yor la sogs pa'i bye brag nges par ma bzung ba ni dran pa'i rgyur 'gyur ba yin no //
translated: and the memory is produced by the perception of the particular height, without the memory having seized the specific characteristics of the height.

original: de nyid las nges pa can nyid ma yin nam ;
analyzed: de nyid las nges pa can nyid ma yin nam ;
translated: But is not the cognition certain with regard to the height?

original: ci la the tshom za ba yin /
analyzed: ci la the tshom za ba yin /
translated: What is the doubt?

original: sngon por nges pa la ni ser por the tshom za ba'am /
analyzed: sngon por nges pa la ni ser por the tshom za ba'am /
translated: The doubt is not with regard to the height, but with regard to the man or the post.

original: de'i rgyu yang ma yin no //üîΩmi dmigs pa las kyang mtho yor ram /
analyzed: de'i rgyu yang ma yin no // mi dmigs pa las kyang mtho yor ram /
translated: The doubt is not with regard to the cause of the cognition of height.

original: mi dag kho nar the tshom za ba ma yin no //
analyzed: mi dag kho nar the tshom za ba ma yin no //
translated: The doubt is not with regard to the post or the man, but with regard to the height.

original: 'o na ci zhe na /üîΩgcig pa de bor nas thams cad 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'o na ci zhe na / gcig pa de bor nas thams cad 'gyur ro //
translated: What is the doubt?

original: 'brel @61a * //
analyzed: 'brel @61a * //
translated: The doubt is with regard to the unity or the multiplicity of the cause.üîΩThe doubt is not with regard to the height, but with regard to the cause of the height.

original: pa las ni de'i khyad par la nges pa yin gyi spyi ni ma yin te /
analyzed: pa las ni de'i khyad par la nges pa yin gyi spyi ni ma yin te /
translated: But from that, there is ascertainment of its particular, not of the universal,

original: thag ring ba bzhin du nye ba la yang de'i shes par thal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //üîΩde'i phyir mi dmigs pa la log pa can mtho yor nyid dam /
analyzed: thag ring ba bzhin du nye ba la yang de'i shes par thal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro // de'i phyir mi dmigs pa la log pa can mtho yor nyid dam /
translated: because, like something distant, it would follow that its cognition would be of that even when near.üîΩTherefore, in non-apprehension, there is no ascertainment of the absence of a particular, because there is no ascertainment of the absence of a universal.

original: mi nyid du nges pa can ma yin pas nges pa ma bzung pa'i phyir nges par bzung ba med pa'i bdag nyid ni spyi yin la de'i shes pa yang the tshom yin no //
analyzed: mi nyid du nges pa can ma yin pas nges pa ma bzung pa'i phyir nges par bzung ba med pa'i bdag nyid ni spyi yin la de'i shes pa yang the tshom yin no //
translated: Thus, the universal is by nature not ascertained, and its cognition is doubt.

original: khams gsum po la thal bar 'gyur ba ma yin te /
analyzed: khams gsum po la thal bar 'gyur ba ma yin te /
translated: It does not follow that it is in the three realms,

original: de ma yin pa las ldog par byed pa nyid du nges pas khyad par can yin gyi yul du nges pa ma bzung ba ni khongs su gtogs pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de ma yin pa las ldog par byed pa nyid du nges pas khyad par can yin gyi yul du nges pa ma bzung ba ni khongs su gtogs pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because it is ascertained as just the opposite of that, it is particular, not included, because the object is not ascertained.

original: de nyid kyis na blo nyid ces bstan pa de'i rnam pa ma yin pas dben pa ni the tshom gyi shes pa yin no //
analyzed: de nyid kyis na blo nyid ces bstan pa de'i rnam pa ma yin pas dben pa ni the tshom gyi shes pa yin no //
translated: By that very fact, it is taught that the cognition itself is devoid of its aspect, and that is the cognition of doubt.

original: de ma yin pa las ldog par byed pa yin yang yul nges pa can gyi khyad par gyi nges pa ma bzung ba yin te /
analyzed: de ma yin pa las ldog par byed pa yin yang yul nges pa can gyi khyad par gyi nges pa ma bzung ba yin te /
translated: It is a determination that excludes what is not that, but it does not apprehend a particular that is determined with respect to an object.

original: dngos po dang dngos po med pa thun mong gi bdag nyid can ni the tshom ste /
analyzed: dngos po dang dngos po med pa thun mong gi bdag nyid can ni the tshom ste /
translated: Doubt is the common nature of a thing and a non-thing.

original: yid gnyis kyi rgyu yin pa'i phyir the tshom yin no zhes pa'i don to //üîΩde yang de ma yin pa las ldog par byed pa'i ngo bos snang ba mi dmigs pa yin pa'am /
analyzed: yid gnyis kyi rgyu yin pa'i phyir the tshom yin no zhes pa'i don to // de yang de ma yin pa las ldog par byed pa'i ngo bos snang ba mi dmigs pa yin pa'am /
translated: It is called doubt because it is the cause of a double-mindedness.

original: de'i khyad par la ltos nas kyang snang ba mi dmigs pa yin no //
analyzed: de'i khyad par la ltos nas kyang snang ba mi dmigs pa yin no //
translated: Moreover, it is a non-apprehension of the appearance of the nature of that which excludes what is not that, or it is a non-apprehension of the appearance that depends on its particular.

original: dmigs par bya ba'i don gyi rang bzhin zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: dmigs par bya ba'i don gyi rang bzhin zhes bya ba ste /
translated: The nature of the object that is to be apprehended is called the object of doubt.

original: rtogs par bya ba'am /
analyzed: rtogs par bya ba'am /
translated: It is to be understood.

original: mi de ma yin pa las ldog par byed pa khyad par nges pa ma bzung ba snang ba dang cig shos kyi mi dmigs pa'i bdag nyid ni the tshom za ba'i rgyu yin pa'i phyir the tshom yin no //
analyzed: mi de ma yin pa las ldog par byed pa khyad par nges pa ma bzung ba snang ba dang cig shos kyi mi dmigs pa'i bdag nyid ni the tshom za ba'i rgyu yin pa'i phyir the tshom yin no //
translated: It is doubt because it is the cause of doubt, since it is a determination that excludes what is not that, but does not apprehend a particular, and it has the nature of a non-apprehension of the appearance of the other.

original: de lta na the tshom gyi shes pa ni dbang po'i don las 'byung bar ma gyur tam /
analyzed: de lta na the tshom gyi shes pa ni dbang po'i don las 'byung bar ma gyur tam /
translated: In that case, is the consciousness of doubt not derived from the object of the sense faculty?

original: de lta ni ma yin te /
analyzed: de lta ni ma yin te /
translated: That is not so.

original: don byed pa can gyi dbang po'i don nye ba na gnas par rung ba nyid kyi stobs las skyes pa zhes bstan pas /üîΩdon byed pa can ma yin pa thag ring ba na gnas pa'i stobs las byung ba las /
analyzed: don byed pa can gyi dbang po'i don nye ba na gnas par rung ba nyid kyi stobs las skyes pa zhes bstan pas / don byed pa can ma yin pa thag ring ba na gnas pa'i stobs las byung ba las /
translated: Since it is taught that it arises from the power of the object of the sense faculty that is capable of effective action and is present,üîΩit is not the case that doubt arises from the power of that which is incapable of effective action and is distant.

original: the tshom za bar thal bar 'gyur ba ma yin te /
analyzed: the tshom za bar thal bar 'gyur ba ma yin te /
translated: It is not the case that it follows that doubt arises from the power of that which is distant,

original: thag ring po nas gnas pa nyid ni rab rib bzhin du 'di lta bu shes pa la nus pa yin la /
analyzed: thag ring po nas gnas pa nyid ni rab rib bzhin du 'di lta bu shes pa la nus pa yin la /
translated: because that which is distant is capable of producing such a consciousness, like visual distortion.

original: dbang po'i don ni de'i rjes su 'jug pas nye ba na gnas pa tsam la nus pa can yin no //
analyzed: dbang po'i don ni de'i rjes su 'jug pas nye ba na gnas pa tsam la nus pa can yin no //
translated: Since the object of the sense faculty is engaged in that, it is capable of producing a consciousness that is merely present.

original: de yang mig gis ni thag ring po la ma yin zhes bstan pa yin no //
analyzed: de yang mig gis ni thag ring po la ma yin zhes bstan pa yin no //
translated: And it is taught that the eye does not see what is distant.

original: don mthong na zhes bya ba ni mi rigs te /
analyzed: don mthong na zhes bya ba ni mi rigs te /
translated: It is illogical to say that it sees the object,

original: de la don byed pa can ma mthong ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de la don byed pa can ma mthong ba'i phyir ro //
translated: because it does not see that which is capable of effective action.

original: @61b gang du de byed pa can gyi sa phyogs la sogs pa mthong ba yin na /
analyzed: @61b gang du de byed pa can gyi sa phyogs la sogs pa mthong ba yin na /
translated: If one sees the place where the fire is located,

original: de ltar lkog tu gyur pa'i me la sogs pa las skyes bus the tshom za ba ma yin la /üîΩgang du dngos po gzhan la 'jug pa ma yin pa'i bye brag gis dngos po'i mi dmigs pa dang / mi dran pa yin la /
analyzed: de ltar lkog tu gyur pa'i me la sogs pa las skyes bus the tshom za ba ma yin la / gang du dngos po gzhan la 'jug pa ma yin pa'i bye brag gis dngos po'i mi dmigs pa dang / mi dran pa yin la /
translated: then one would not doubt that the fire is produced from a person.üîΩIn some cases, the nonobservation of a thing is due to the engagement of another thing, and in some cases, it is due to the nonapprehension of a thing.

original: de dang 'dra ba nyid kyi don byed pa ni de byed pa can ma yin pa las ldog par byed pa yang dmigs pa yin na ni /
analyzed: de dang 'dra ba nyid kyi don byed pa ni de byed pa can ma yin pa las ldog par byed pa yang dmigs pa yin na ni /
translated: If the observation of a thing that is similar to the thing that is not observed is what causes one to ascertain the negation of the thing that is not observed,

original: de la phyin ci log pa yin te /
analyzed: de la phyin ci log pa yin te /
translated: then that observation would be mistaken.

original: nya phyis la dngul gyi shes pa lta bu'o //üîΩgang gi tshe 'dra ba la dmigs pa de'i tshe tha dad par mthong ba'i phyir de nyid du sgro 'dogs pa med pa ma yin nam /
analyzed: nya phyis la dngul gyi shes pa lta bu'o // gang gi tshe 'dra ba la dmigs pa de'i tshe tha dad par mthong ba'i phyir de nyid du sgro 'dogs pa med pa ma yin nam /
translated: For example, it would be like the cognition of silver with respect to a seashell.

original: 'on te de nyid yin par dmigs pa yin na dbang po las skyes pa ji ltar phyin ci log ma yin /
analyzed: 'on te de nyid yin par dmigs pa yin na dbang po las skyes pa ji ltar phyin ci log ma yin /
translated: If the observation of a thing that is similar to the thing that is not observed is what causes one to ascertain the negation of the thing that is not observed, then since one sees the difference between the two, there would be no superimposition of the thing that is not observed.üîΩBut if the observation of a thing that is similar to the thing that is not observed is what causes one to ascertain the thing that is not observed, then how could the cognition produced from the sense faculty be mistaken?

original: don byed pa can du nyams su myong ba cung zad mthong na ni phyin ci log ma yin la /
analyzed: don byed pa can du nyams su myong ba cung zad mthong na ni phyin ci log ma yin la /
translated: If one sees even a slight experience of the object as a functioning thing, it is not erroneous.

original: gnyi ga nyid du nges pa ma bzung na ni snang ba ma yin te /
analyzed: gnyi ga nyid du nges pa ma bzung na ni snang ba ma yin te /
translated: If one does not ascertain both, it is not an appearance,

original: gang yang rung ba med par nges pa'i phyir /
analyzed: gang yang rung ba med par nges pa'i phyir /
translated: because one does not ascertain either one.

original: nges pa med pa ni the tshom za bar thal bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: nges pa med pa ni the tshom za bar thal bar 'gyur ro //
translated: If one does not ascertain either one, it follows that one is in doubt.

original: 'dra ba'o zhes bya ba'am de nyid do zhes bya bar dmigs pa ma yin du zin kyang /
analyzed: 'dra ba'o zhes bya ba'am de nyid do zhes bya bar dmigs pa ma yin du zin kyang /
translated: Even if one does not apprehend an object as similar or as the same,

original: 'on kyang 'dra ba'i dmigs pa dang 'dra ba yin pa'i phyir /
analyzed: 'on kyang 'dra ba'i dmigs pa dang 'dra ba yin pa'i phyir /
translated: nevertheless, because the object is similar to the similarity,

original: 'dra ba nyid du ma dmigs pa la dgos pa ci zhig yod /
analyzed: 'dra ba nyid du ma dmigs pa la dgos pa ci zhig yod /
translated: what is the point of not apprehending it as similar?

original: sngon po zhes nye bar mtshon pa ma yin pa'i sngon por mthong ba /
analyzed: sngon po zhes nye bar mtshon pa ma yin pa'i sngon por mthong ba /
translated: Just as one sees blue without apprehending it as blue,

original: sngon po'i shes pa skyed par byed pa ji ltar yin pa de bzhin du 'dra ba mthong ba yang 'dra ba'o zhes bya bar skyed par byed par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: sngon po'i shes pa skyed par byed pa ji ltar yin pa de bzhin du 'dra ba mthong ba yang 'dra ba'o zhes bya bar skyed par byed par 'gyur ro //
translated: and it generates the consciousness of blue, in the same way, one sees similarity and it generates the idea of similarity.

original: khyad par nye bar mtshon pa yin pa la ni de dang 'dra ba zhes bya ba med pa'i phyir de las 'di ji ltar yin /
analyzed: khyad par nye bar mtshon pa yin pa la ni de dang 'dra ba zhes bya ba med pa'i phyir de las 'di ji ltar yin /
translated: But in the case of a specific example, there is no such thing as ‚Äúsimilar to that,‚Äù so how could this be so?

original: de'i ngo bo mthong ba'i bag chags las ;
analyzed: de'i ngo bo mthong ba'i bag chags las ;
translated: It is not produced from the sense faculty, but rather from the latent impressions of seeing its nature.

original: zin por gyur ba'i de 'di'o zhes bya bar 'gyur ba ni dbang po las skyes pa ma yin pa ste /
analyzed: zin por gyur ba'i de 'di'o zhes bya bar 'gyur ba ni dbang po las skyes pa ma yin pa ste /
translated: When there is a convention, the mind superimposes the nature of that object and designates it as ‚Äúthis is that.‚Äù

original: dbang po las skyes pas ni 'dra ba'i don byed par mthong ba las /
analyzed: dbang po las skyes pas ni 'dra ba'i don byed par mthong ba las /
translated: But when it is produced from the sense faculty, it sees an object that performs a similar function.

original: de'i ngo bo ni yid kyis sgro btags pas brda yod na de 'di yin no zhes tha snyad 'dogs pa yin gyi gzhan du ni ma yin no //
analyzed: de'i ngo bo ni yid kyis sgro btags pas brda yod na de 'di yin no zhes tha snyad 'dogs pa yin gyi gzhan du ni ma yin no //
translated: When there is a convention, the mind superimposes the nature of that object and designates it as ‚Äúthis is that,‚Äù but not otherwise.

original: gnyi ga'i bye brag ma mthong ba de mthong ba'i bag chags las zin por gyur pa ma yin pa la ni /üîΩthag ring ba nyid la sogs pa'i dbang gis dbang las skyes pa nyid rnam par rtog pa'i mthong ba yin te /
analyzed: gnyi ga'i bye brag ma mthong ba de mthong ba'i bag chags las zin por gyur pa ma yin pa la ni /üîΩthag ring ba nyid la sogs pa'i dbang gis dbang las skyes pa nyid rnam par rtog pa'i mthong ba yin te /
translated: When one does not see the specific features of both, it is not produced from the latent impressions of seeing that object.üîΩWhen there is a convention, the mind superimposes the nature of that object and designates it as ‚Äúthis is that,‚Äù but not otherwise.

original: gnyi ga'i bye brag dang mtshan nyid mi mthun pa'i cha'i don byed pa gnyi ga ma yin pa tha dad pa @62a * //
analyzed: gnyi ga'i bye brag dang mtshan nyid mi mthun pa'i cha'i don byed pa gnyi ga ma yin pa tha dad pa @62a * //
translated: The meaning of the term ‚Äúdistinct‚Äù is that which is not both, that is, that which does not perform the function of either of the two, since the specific characteristics of the two are not the same.

original: can dngos po la med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: can dngos po la med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because the function of a thing that is neither of the two, i.e., that has a nature different from the nature of each of the two, does not exist in a real entity.

original: tshad ma'i yul du gyur pa'i sngon po la sogs pa skad cig ma dang skad cig ma ma yin pa'i ngo bor ma nges pa yang don byed pa'i gzhal bya nyid mngon sum pa yin no //
analyzed: tshad ma'i yul du gyur pa'i sngon po la sogs pa skad cig ma dang skad cig ma ma yin pa'i ngo bor ma nges pa yang don byed pa'i gzhal bya nyid mngon sum pa yin no //
translated: The momentary and non-momentary nature of blue, etc., which are the objects of valid cognition, are also the directly perceived objects of the function of ascertainment.

original: ma nges pa skad cig ma nyid la sogs pa'i nges pa med pa'i bdag nyid can ni the tshom 'di'i rgyu yin no zhes bya ba ni rnam par dbye ba'o //üîΩde lta bu'i blo'i go bar bya ba ni /
analyzed: ma nges pa skad cig ma nyid la sogs pa'i nges pa med pa'i bdag nyid can ni the tshom 'di'i rgyu yin no zhes bya ba ni rnam par dbye ba'o // de lta bu'i blo'i go bar bya ba ni /
translated: The cause of this doubt is the indeterminate nature of the ascertainment of momentariness, etc. This is the analysis.

original: de ma yin pa las log par byed pa'i dbyibs ma yin nam /
analyzed: de ma yin pa las log par byed pa'i dbyibs ma yin nam /
translated: The object of such a cognition is not the shape that distinguishes it from what is not that,

original: gnyis kyi bye brag nges par ma bzung ba yin yang don byed pa'i ngo bo dngos po las tha dad par mngon sum pa yin te ;
analyzed: gnyis kyi bye brag nges par ma bzung ba yin yang don byed pa'i ngo bo dngos po las tha dad par mngon sum pa yin te ;
translated: is it? Even though the distinction of the two is not ascertained, the nature of the function of ascertainment is directly perceived as different from a real entity.

original: skad cig ma la sogs pa'i bye brag nges par ma bzung ba yang sngon po la sogs pa'i ngo bo bzhin du yod pa nyid na /
analyzed: skad cig ma la sogs pa'i bye brag nges par ma bzung ba yang sngon po la sogs pa'i ngo bo bzhin du yod pa nyid na /
translated: Just as the entity of blue and so on exists, the particularities of momentariness and so on also exist, even if they are not ascertained.

original: de yod pa'i phyir de ji ltar dbang po las skyes pa ma yin par the tshom za ba yin zhes pa'i bsam pas /
analyzed: de yod pa'i phyir de ji ltar dbang po las skyes pa ma yin par the tshom za ba yin zhes pa'i bsam pas /
translated: Therefore, how can you doubt that it is not produced from the sense faculty?

original: gal te dbyibs zhes bya ba la lan du skyes bu dang mtho yor gyi zhes bya ba ste /üîΩgal te de don byed pa yin na thag ring ba'am /
analyzed: gal te dbyibs zhes bya ba la lan du skyes bu dang mtho yor gyi zhes bya ba ste / gal te de don byed pa yin na thag ring ba'am /
translated: If you say that shape is not a sense object, then the response is that it is like a man and a scarecrow.

original: nye ba la yang sngon po bzhin du khyad par nges par ma bzung ba dmigs par 'gyur ba yin no //
analyzed: nye ba la yang sngon po bzhin du khyad par nges par ma bzung ba dmigs par 'gyur ba yin no //
translated: If it performs a function, then like blue, it would be observed without ascertaining its particularities, whether it is distant or near.

original: thag nye ba la ni de lta bur dmigs pa ma yin te /üîΩdes na khyad par gyi rnam pa nges par ma bzung ba'i khyad par snang ba nyid de yin no //
analyzed: thag nye ba la ni de lta bur dmigs pa ma yin te / des na khyad par gyi rnam pa nges par ma bzung ba'i khyad par snang ba nyid de yin no //
translated: But it is not observed in that way when it is near.üîΩTherefore, it is the appearance of a particularity without ascertaining its particular aspect.

original: khyad par gyi nges pa rnam par ma bzung ba'i khyad par du snang ba nyid de yin par bstan pa ni /
analyzed: khyad par gyi nges pa rnam par ma bzung ba'i khyad par du snang ba nyid de yin par bstan pa ni /
translated: The particularity is the appearance without ascertaining the particular aspect.

original: spyi'i don gzhan pa nyid yin na zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: spyi'i don gzhan pa nyid yin na zhes bya ba'o //
translated: If it is a different object in general.üîΩIf the form of the distinction is not apprehended, how can that appearance be of that?

original: gal te khyad par gyi rnam pa'i nges pa ma bzung ba yin na snang ba de ji ltar de'i yin snyam du sems pas /
analyzed: gal te khyad par gyi rnam pa'i nges pa ma bzung ba yin na snang ba de ji ltar de'i yin snyam du sems pas /
translated: Thinking this, he says:üîΩIf for you, too,

original: gal te khyed kyi phyogs la yang //üîΩzhes bya ba la sogs pa nas /
analyzed: gal te khyed kyi phyogs la yang // zhes bya ba la sogs pa nas /
translated: up to:

original: don mi gsal bar snang ba min //
analyzed: don mi gsal bar snang ba min //
translated: It is not an unclear appearance of the object.

original: zhes bya ba'i bar du'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba'i bar du'o //
translated: In response, he says:

original: lan du / gal te de rnams can min pa'i //üîΩzhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: lan du / gal te de rnams can min pa'i // zhes bya ba ste /
translated: If it is not of those.

original: de ste / nges pa bzung ba 'di'i rnam pa ste /
analyzed: de ste / nges pa bzung ba 'di'i rnam pa ste /
translated: If this is the form of the apprehension of the distinction,

original: gang la rnam pa de yod pa ma yin pa ste /
analyzed: gang la rnam pa de yod pa ma yin pa ste /
translated: then it is not of that which has that form.

original: las de khyad par las thag ring ba nyid kyi lhan cig byed pa de las skyes par 'gyur ba nyid kyis de las skye bas de 'dzin pa nyid du brjod do //
analyzed: las de khyad par las thag ring ba nyid kyi lhan cig byed pa de las skyes par 'gyur ba nyid kyis de las skye bas de 'dzin pa nyid du brjod do //
translated: That action is far removed from the distinction, and it arises from that which is a co-originator. Because it arises from that, it is said to apprehend that.

original: 'di skad bstan pa yin te /
analyzed: 'di skad bstan pa yin te /
translated: This is what is being taught.

original: khyad par gyi rnam pa nges pa ma bzung ba'i khyad par 'dzin pa can ni //
analyzed: khyad par gyi rnam pa nges pa ma bzung ba'i khyad par 'dzin pa can ni //
translated: The apprehension of the distinction that does not apprehend the form of the distinction

original: khyad par gyi rnam pa'i kun du @62b bzung ba la ltos na mi gsal ba yin par brjod do //
analyzed: khyad par gyi rnam pa'i kun du @62b bzung ba la ltos na mi gsal ba yin par brjod do //
translated: But in relation to the apprehension of the particular aspect, it is said to be unclear.

original: de lta bu'i blo ni rgyu med pa'i phyir nye ba las mi skye ba yin yang thag ring pa'i lhan cig byed pa'i khyad par las skye ba yin la /
analyzed: de lta bu'i blo ni rgyu med pa'i phyir nye ba las mi skye ba yin yang thag ring pa'i lhan cig byed pa'i khyad par las skye ba yin la /
translated: Such cognition, although not arising from proximity because it has no cause, arises from the distant specific cooperative conditions.

original: spyi ni rdzogs pa yin te thag ring por yang rang gi ngo bo dmigs pa yin no //
analyzed: spyi ni rdzogs pa yin te thag ring por yang rang gi ngo bo dmigs pa yin no //
translated: The universal is complete, and its nature is perceived even from a distance.

original: nye ba las ni chos shin tu gsal bar dmigs par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: nye ba las ni chos shin tu gsal bar dmigs par 'gyur ro //
translated: But from proximity, the particular is perceived as very clear.

original: mi dmigs pa'i rgyu yod na dmigs par dang dmigs pa'i rgyu yod na mi dmigs par ni mi rigs te /
analyzed: mi dmigs pa'i rgyu yod na dmigs par dang dmigs pa'i rgyu yod na mi dmigs par ni mi rigs te /
translated: It is not reasonable that when there is a cause for non-perception, there is perception, or that when there is a cause for perception, there is non-perception.

original: khyad par dang spyi dag gi dmigs par byed pa la ni bye brag cung zad kyang med do //
analyzed: khyad par dang spyi dag gi dmigs par byed pa la ni bye brag cung zad kyang med do //
translated: There is not the slightest difference in the perception of the particular and the universal.

original: khyad par las spyi gzhan ma yin pa ni bden te /
analyzed: khyad par las spyi gzhan ma yin pa ni bden te /
translated: It is true that the universal is not different from the particular.

original: gzhan gyi snang ba ni gzhan la mi gsal bar brjod pa ni ma yin te /
analyzed: gzhan gyi snang ba ni gzhan la mi gsal bar brjod pa ni ma yin te /
translated: But the appearance of one to another is not said to be unclear.

original: de lta mod kyi khyad par gyi rnam pa ma bzung ba'i bye brag gi ngo bo ni khyad par gyi rnam pa dang thun mong ba yin pa'i phyir spyi yin par brjod par bya ba yin no snyam du sems pa las /
analyzed: de lta mod kyi khyad par gyi rnam pa ma bzung ba'i bye brag gi ngo bo ni khyad par gyi rnam pa dang thun mong ba yin pa'i phyir spyi yin par brjod par bya ba yin no snyam du sems pa las /
translated: But we think that the universal is the entity of the particular that is not apprehended as a specific aspect, because it is common to the specific aspects.

original: 'on te de nyid spyi yin na zhes zer ba la ;
analyzed: 'on te de nyid spyi yin na zhes zer ba la ;
translated: But if that very thing is the universal,

original: lan ni / blo de las zhes bya ba la sogs pas bstan pa yin te /
analyzed: lan ni / blo de las zhes bya ba la sogs pas bstan pa yin te /
translated: the response to that is indicated by the words ‚Äúthat cognition,‚Äù and so on.

original: khyad par nges par ma bzung ba ni gzhan las ma yin pa'o //
analyzed: khyad par nges par ma bzung ba ni gzhan las ma yin pa'o //
translated: That which does not apprehend a specific aspect is not different from that.

original: gzhan yang gzhan las kyang 'dir brjod par bya ste /
analyzed: gzhan yang gzhan las kyang 'dir brjod par bya ste /
translated: Moreover, here we should say the following:

original: bye brag nges par ma bzung ba'i kha dog dang dbyibs blo la snang ba de dang bral ba ni spyi yin par 'dod pa yin no //
analyzed: bye brag nges par ma bzung ba'i kha dog dang dbyibs blo la snang ba de dang bral ba ni spyi yin par 'dod pa yin no //
translated: The cognition that does not apprehend a specific aspect, but the color and shape that appear to the mind are asserted to be the universal that is free from that.

original: don gang dag kho bos mthong ba de dag gi mthong ba nyid kyi tshad kyi chos gang dag yin pa'i phyir de dang 'dra ba ni chos 'di yin te /
analyzed: don gang dag kho bos mthong ba de dag gi mthong ba nyid kyi tshad kyi chos gang dag yin pa'i phyir de dang 'dra ba ni chos 'di yin te /
translated: The universal is the quality of the object that is seen by me, because it is similar to that which is seen.

original: 'dra ba'i rnam pa bskyed par bya ba ni dmigs par bya ba ste /
analyzed: 'dra ba'i rnam pa bskyed par bya ba ni dmigs par bya ba ste /
translated: The object that is to be generated in a similar aspect is the object of apprehension.

original: de dag gi don la the tshom za ba yin la /
analyzed: de dag gi don la the tshom za ba yin la /
translated: They doubt the meaning of those.

original: 'dra ba don ni spyi'i don yin no snyam du sems pas /
analyzed: 'dra ba don ni spyi'i don yin no snyam du sems pas /
translated: They think that the meaning of similar is the meaning of general.

original: gal te snang ba ni kha dog dang dbyibs nyid yin la zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: gal te snang ba ni kha dog dang dbyibs nyid yin la zhes bya ba ste /
translated: If appearance is just color and shape,

original: thun mong yin pa'i phyir zhes bya ba ste 'dra ba'i phyir ro //üîΩlan du / kha dog dbyibs de'i rang bzhin ni //
analyzed: thun mong yin pa'i phyir zhes bya ba ste 'dra ba'i phyir ro // lan du / kha dog dbyibs de'i rang bzhin ni //
translated: it is common to both, because it is similar.üîΩIn response, it is said:

original: zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: zhes bya ba ste /
translated: The nature of that color and shapeüîΩis not the nature of the object.

original: de'i 'dra ba ni 'di'i chos yin gyi /
analyzed: de'i 'dra ba ni 'di'i chos yin gyi /
translated: That similarity is its attribute,

original: de nyid ni ma yin na ji ltar de las de dag la the tshom za ba yin /
analyzed: de nyid ni ma yin na ji ltar de las de dag la the tshom za ba yin /
translated: but it is not that itself. So how can they doubt that in those?

original: gnyi ga'i thun mong ba la gcig pa med pa'i phyir 'dra ba nyid kho nar sgro btags pas de nyid 'di yin no zhes zer ba ni mi rigs te /
analyzed: gnyi ga'i thun mong ba la gcig pa med pa'i phyir 'dra ba nyid kho nar sgro btags pas de nyid 'di yin no zhes zer ba ni mi rigs te /
translated: Since there is no singularity that is common to both, it is illogical to say that it is just that because similarity is imputed to it alone.

original: 'khrul pa nyid du thal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro zhes bstan pa ni /
analyzed: 'khrul pa nyid du thal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro zhes bstan pa ni /
translated: To demonstrate that it would follow that it is just mistaken, it is said:

original: blo ni 'khrul par thal bar 'gyur //
analyzed: blo ni 'khrul par thal bar 'gyur //
translated: The mind would be mistaken.

original: @63a * // zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: @63a * // zhes bya ba ste /
translated: This is the commentary on the sixth chapter, having sixteen verses, calledüîΩ‚Äúthe examination of the prior entity.‚ÄùüîΩ

original: chos dag gi gcig pa nyid du 'dzin par byed pa'o //
analyzed: chos dag gi gcig pa nyid du 'dzin par byed pa'o //
translated: Thus, it is the apprehension of the sameness of things.

original: des na gnyi ga'i thun mong ba la gcig tu snang ba gnyi ga mi dmigs pa yin la /
analyzed: des na gnyi ga'i thun mong ba la gcig tu snang ba gnyi ga mi dmigs pa yin la /
translated: Therefore, the appearance of sameness in the commonality of both is the non-apprehension of both.

original: gnyi ga la nges par 'dzin pa med par byed par mi 'gyur ro zhes bya bar nye bar bsdu ba ni /
analyzed: gnyi ga la nges par 'dzin pa med par byed par mi 'gyur ro zhes bya bar nye bar bsdu ba ni /
translated: If one does not apprehend the sameness of both, one will not be able to eliminate the apprehension of both as real.

original: gal te kha dog dang dbyibs gzhan du rtogs na zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: gal te kha dog dang dbyibs gzhan du rtogs na zhes bya ba'o //
translated: If one understands that color and shape are different,

original: yang na mtho ba nyid ni spyi ma yin te /
analyzed: yang na mtho ba nyid ni spyi ma yin te /
translated: or, again, height is not a universal,

original: mtho ba'i tshad du gnas pa can yin pa'i phyir /
analyzed: mtho ba'i tshad du gnas pa can yin pa'i phyir /
translated: because it exists as the measure of height,

original: de yang nges par bzung ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de yang nges par bzung ba'i phyir ro //
translated: and that is ascertained.

original: mtho ba nyid kyi chos kyang ma yin te /
analyzed: mtho ba nyid kyi chos kyang ma yin te /
translated: Nor is height a property,

original: de ni tha dad pa las spyi'i ngo bo ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de ni tha dad pa las spyi'i ngo bo ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because that is not the universal nature of the different.

original: kha dog dang dbyibs kyi spyi ni gcig pa yin te /
analyzed: kha dog dang dbyibs kyi spyi ni gcig pa yin te /
translated: The universal of color and shape is one,

original: bdag nyid du 'gyur ba'i khyad par gnyi ga thun mong ba yin pa'i phyir dang / spyi ni the tshom du byed pa yin no snyam du sems pas /
analyzed: bdag nyid du 'gyur ba'i khyad par gnyi ga thun mong ba yin pa'i phyir dang / spyi ni the tshom du byed pa yin no snyam du sems pas /
translated: Because the difference of being the self is common to both, and because it is thought that the universal causes doubt.

original: kha dog dang dbyibs dag gi de nyid ces zer ba la /
analyzed: kha dog dang dbyibs dag gi de nyid ces zer ba la /
translated: The opponent says, ‚ÄúThe universal is the reality of color and shape.‚Äù

original: lan ni / kha dog dbyibs de'i rang bzhin ni //
analyzed: lan ni / kha dog dbyibs de'i rang bzhin ni //
translated: The response is: The nature of that color and shape

original: zhes bya ba la gzhan pas te ;
analyzed: zhes bya ba la gzhan pas te ;
translated: is not different from that of a human.

original: tha dad pa'i rang bzhin las mtho yor dang mi la yod pa'i kha dog dang / dbyibs rtogs pa la tha mi dad pa 'dis /
analyzed: tha dad pa'i rang bzhin las mtho yor dang mi la yod pa'i kha dog dang / dbyibs rtogs pa la tha mi dad pa 'dis /
translated: The nature of color and shape that exists in a human is not different from the nature of color and shape that exists in a cairn.

original: de las de dag gcig pa nyid ji ltar ma 'khrul pa yin /
analyzed: de las de dag gcig pa nyid ji ltar ma 'khrul pa yin /
translated: How can the nonerroneous cognition of their sameness be the cognition of the universal?

original: des na spyi ni mngon sum pa ma yin la /
analyzed: des na spyi ni mngon sum pa ma yin la /
translated: Therefore the universal is not directly perceived.

original: mngon sum ni 'khrul pa can ma yin no //
analyzed: mngon sum ni 'khrul pa can ma yin no //
translated: Direct perception is nonerroneous.

original: de'i phyir mtho yor dang mi la yod pa'i kha dog dang dbyibs tha dad pa'i nges pa ma bzung ba la sogs pa las spyi ma yin par brjod de /
analyzed: de'i phyir mtho yor dang mi la yod pa'i kha dog dang dbyibs tha dad pa'i nges pa ma bzung ba la sogs pa las spyi ma yin par brjod de /
translated: Therefore, because the universal is not ascertained to be different from the color and shape that exist in a cairn and a human, and so on, it is said to be not a universal.

original: dus ma yin pa'i phyir dang / mi dmigs pa yin pa'i phyir dang / 'khrul pa nyid du thal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir yang ngo //
analyzed: dus ma yin pa'i phyir dang / mi dmigs pa yin pa'i phyir dang / 'khrul pa nyid du thal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir yang ngo //
translated: Because it is not the right time, because it is not observed, and because error would ensue.

original: kha dog dang dbyibs gcig pa ma yin du zin kyang /
analyzed: kha dog dang dbyibs gcig pa ma yin du zin kyang /
translated: Even though the color and shape are not the same,

original: yan lag can yin la de yang bar mtshams su ni gcig tu snang ba yin la /
analyzed: yan lag can yin la de yang bar mtshams su ni gcig tu snang ba yin la /
translated: the possessor of parts is one, and it appears as such.

original: de'i yang 'khyog po bu ga can la sogs pa'i bye brag tu byed pa gang yin pa rnams dang / lag pa la sogs pa de rnams su thag ring ba la sogs pa mthong ba ma yin la /
analyzed: de'i yang 'khyog po bu ga can la sogs pa'i bye brag tu byed pa gang yin pa rnams dang / lag pa la sogs pa de rnams su thag ring ba la sogs pa mthong ba ma yin la /
translated: The distinctions of its crooked holes and so on and its parts such as the arms are not seen from a distance and so on.

original: kha dog la sogs pa'i khyad par ni yan lag can ma yin te /
analyzed: kha dog la sogs pa'i khyad par ni yan lag can ma yin te /
translated: The distinctions of color and so on are not the possessor of parts,

original: de mi 'dzin pa yang dngos po'i nye bar bsgyur bas yan lag can shel du 'dzin pa'i phyir la /
analyzed: de mi 'dzin pa yang dngos po'i nye bar bsgyur bas yan lag can shel du 'dzin pa'i phyir la /
translated: because the possessor of parts is apprehended as crystal by the nominal affix,

original: shel ni gzhan pa nyid du der skyes pa ma yin te /
analyzed: shel ni gzhan pa nyid du der skyes pa ma yin te /
translated: and crystal is not generated as something else.

original: de'i tshe yang snga ma nyid du ngo shes pa'i phyir te /
analyzed: de'i tshe yang snga ma nyid du ngo shes pa'i phyir te /
translated: Because it is recognized as the same at that time.

original: des na bye brag nges par ma bzung ba nyid @63b spyi yin par mi rigs so snyam du sems pas /
analyzed: des na bye brag nges par ma bzung ba nyid @63b spyi yin par mi rigs so snyam du sems pas /
translated: Therefore, it is not reasonable to think that a universal is that which is not apprehended as a particular.

original: 'on te der yan lag can snang ba zhes bya ba la sogs pa smras pa la /üîΩlan ni / kha dog dbyibs kyi rang bzhin las //
analyzed: 'on te der yan lag can snang ba zhes bya ba la sogs pa smras pa la / lan ni / kha dog dbyibs kyi rang bzhin las //
translated: But if you say that the possessor of parts appears there,

original: zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: zhes bya ba ste /
translated: the response is:üîΩIt is not a substance, because it is the nature of color and shape.

original: kha dog tsam ni rdzas ma yin te /
analyzed: kha dog tsam ni rdzas ma yin te /
translated: Color alone is not a substance,

original: thams cad kyang de'i ngo bo nyid du bye brag med par thal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir la /
analyzed: thams cad kyang de'i ngo bo nyid du bye brag med par thal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir la /
translated: because it follows that everything would be undifferentiated in the nature of that color.

original: rdzas kyang de'i ngo bo nyid kyis bye brag tu 'byed pa ma yin no //
analyzed: rdzas kyang de'i ngo bo nyid kyis bye brag tu 'byed pa ma yin no //
translated: And a substance is not differentiated by that nature.

original: dbyibs la bum pa nyid la sogs par bye brag tu 'byed par byed pa yin no zhe na /
analyzed: dbyibs la bum pa nyid la sogs par bye brag tu 'byed par byed pa yin no zhe na /
translated: But shape is differentiated as a pot and so on.

original: 'di yang kha dog la yang mtshungs te /
analyzed: 'di yang kha dog la yang mtshungs te /
translated: This is similar to color.

original: kha dog 'dzin pa na yang nye ba na gnas pa la sogs pa'i dbyibs tsam 'dzin pa'i phyir rdzas 'dzin pa yang ma yin la /
analyzed: kha dog 'dzin pa na yang nye ba na gnas pa la sogs pa'i dbyibs tsam 'dzin pa'i phyir rdzas 'dzin pa yang ma yin la /
translated: When color is apprehended, shape alone is apprehended, such as that it is located nearby and so on. Therefore it is not the apprehension of a substance.

original: dbyibs tsam ni don byed pa ma yin no //
analyzed: dbyibs tsam ni don byed pa ma yin no //
translated: And mere shape does not perform a function.

original: rdzas kyang de las gzhan pa las tha dad pa ma yin par ma dmigs pa ma yin nam /
analyzed: rdzas kyang de las gzhan pa las tha dad pa ma yin par ma dmigs pa ma yin nam /
translated: But isn‚Äôt it also the case that substance is not perceived as different from that?

original: ji ltar don byed pa yin /
analyzed: ji ltar don byed pa yin /
translated: How can it perform a function?

original: dbyibs dang de la rjes su dpog pa'i kha dog gis khyad par can gyi don byed pa yin no zhe na /
analyzed: dbyibs dang de la rjes su dpog pa'i kha dog gis khyad par can gyi don byed pa yin no zhe na /
translated: If you say that it performs a function that is qualified by shape and the color that is inferred from it,

original: mi rigs te /
analyzed: mi rigs te /
translated: that is illogical.

original: dpag bya kha dog dang khyad par can gyi dbyibs las tha dad pa'i rdzas ma dmigs pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: dpag bya kha dog dang khyad par can gyi dbyibs las tha dad pa'i rdzas ma dmigs pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because a substance that is different from the color that is to be inferred and the shape that is qualified by it is not perceived.

original: snang ba'i kha dog dang khyad par can nyid kyang rdzas bzhin du dbyibs la yang 'khrul pa'i phyir /
analyzed: snang ba'i kha dog dang khyad par can nyid kyang rdzas bzhin du dbyibs la yang 'khrul pa'i phyir /
translated: And just like substance, the color that is perceived and the shape that is qualified by it are also mistaken.

original: mkhas pa ma yin pa'i de ni brdzun pa yin la ;
analyzed: mkhas pa ma yin pa'i de ni brdzun pa yin la ;
translated: That is illogical because it is false for the unwise.

original: mkhas pa rnams kyi tha dad pa'i blo yin no zhes bya ba'i rigs pas so //
analyzed: mkhas pa rnams kyi tha dad pa'i blo yin no zhes bya ba'i rigs pas so //
translated: It is the perception of the wise that they are different.üîΩHow do you know?

original: ci las shes zhes bya ba ni re zhig dbang po las kyang ma yin la /
analyzed: ci las shes zhes bya ba ni re zhig dbang po las kyang ma yin la /
translated: It is not from the sense faculty.

original: thag ring ba nyid dang / rab rib dang / nye bar bsgyur ba las kyang ma yin te /
analyzed: thag ring ba nyid dang / rab rib dang / nye bar bsgyur ba las kyang ma yin te /
translated: It is not from distance, blurred vision, or a transformation.

original: mi dmigs pa'i rgyu yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: mi dmigs pa'i rgyu yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because it is the cause of non-apprehension.

original: mi dmigs pa'i rgyu yin na gsal bar dmigs pa yin la /
analyzed: mi dmigs pa'i rgyu yin na gsal bar dmigs pa yin la /
translated: If it is the cause of non-apprehension, it is clearly apprehended;

original: nye bar bsgyur ba la sogs pa dmigs pa'i rgyu yod na ches shin tu dmigs par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: nye bar bsgyur ba la sogs pa dmigs pa'i rgyu yod na ches shin tu dmigs par 'gyur ro //
translated: but if there is a cause of apprehension, such as a prefix, it is very much apprehended.

original: yon tan yin pa'i phyir kha dog dang dbyibs nyid rten pa nyid yin pas rten gyi rdzas 'phel ba yin par bstan pa ni /
analyzed: yon tan yin pa'i phyir kha dog dang dbyibs nyid rten pa nyid yin pas rten gyi rdzas 'phel ba yin par bstan pa ni /
translated: The demonstration that the substance of the support increases because color and shape themselves are the support, because they are qualities, is as follows:

original: de dag las ni gzhan pa yin zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: de dag las ni gzhan pa yin zhes bya ba ste /
translated: ‚ÄúThey are different from those.‚Äù

original: dbyibs kyi dngos po las gzhan pa ma dmigs pa'i phyir mi rten pa nyid yin te /
analyzed: dbyibs kyi dngos po las gzhan pa ma dmigs pa'i phyir mi rten pa nyid yin te /
translated: Because the thing of shape is not apprehended as different, it is not the support;

original: dmigs par bya ba ni yon tan yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: dmigs par bya ba ni yon tan yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because the object of apprehension is a quality.

original: khyab par byed pa dang 'gal ba mngon sum pa yin te /üîΩde sgrub par byed pa ni mig ma yin pa'i mngon sum @64a * //
analyzed: khyab par byed pa dang 'gal ba mngon sum pa yin te / de sgrub par byed pa ni mig ma yin pa'i mngon sum @64a * //
translated: There is the contradiction with the pervader, which is directly perceived.

original: pa nyid la sogs pa gnod pa can yin te /
analyzed: pa nyid la sogs pa gnod pa can yin te /
translated: The proof of that is the contradiction with the direct perception of not being the eye, etc.

original: spyi la sogs pas me nges pa ma yin no //
analyzed: spyi la sogs pas me nges pa ma yin no //
translated: The generality, etc., are not the ascertainment of fire.

original: de las gzhan pa nyid kyis khyad par la yang blo yin par 'grub pa'i gtan tshigs nyid yin gyi du ba bzhin du dngos su ba ni ma yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: de las gzhan pa nyid kyis khyad par la yang blo yin par 'grub pa'i gtan tshigs nyid yin gyi du ba bzhin du dngos su ba ni ma yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: But it is not a direct reason, like smoke, for the existence of the cognition of difference.

original: ljang gu dang ser ba la sogs pa'i kha dog dang chung du dang chen po nyid la sogs pa'i dbyibs kyang gzhan dang gzhan du 'gyur ba ma yin nam /
analyzed: ljang gu dang ser ba la sogs pa'i kha dog dang chung du dang chen po nyid la sogs pa'i dbyibs kyang gzhan dang gzhan du 'gyur ba ma yin nam /
translated: But aren‚Äôt the color, such as green and yellow, and the shape, such as small and large, different?

original: rgya ltar gyi 'bras bu ni ma yin te /
analyzed: rgya ltar gyi 'bras bu ni ma yin te /
translated: The shape is not the effect of the substance,

original: de nyid ni gnas skabs thams cad du dmigs pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de nyid ni gnas skabs thams cad du dmigs pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because it is observed in all states.

original: gang zhig 'gyur na yang gang mi 'gyur ba de ni de las tha dad pa yin la /
analyzed: gang zhig 'gyur na yang gang mi 'gyur ba de ni de las tha dad pa yin la /
translated: If something changes but something else does not, then the latter is different from the former.

original: kha dog dang dbyibs 'gyur yang rdzas ni mi 'gyur ba yin pa'i phyir rjes su 'gro ba dang ldog pa'i tshad ma yin no snyam du sems pa la /
analyzed: kha dog dang dbyibs 'gyur yang rdzas ni mi 'gyur ba yin pa'i phyir rjes su 'gro ba dang ldog pa'i tshad ma yin no snyam du sems pa la /
translated: But even though the color and shape change, the substance does not change. Therefore, the substance is the substratum of the color and shape.üîΩBut if the color and shape are different from the substance, then the substance would not be the substratum of the color and shape.üîΩTherefore, the substance is the substratum of the color and shape.

original: sngon po nyid la sogs pa'i kha dog gi rang bzhin nyid ces bya ba smos te /
analyzed: sngon po nyid la sogs pa'i kha dog gi rang bzhin nyid ces bya ba smos te /
translated: The author of the commentary says, ‚ÄúThe nature of the color, such as blue, etc.,

original: sngon po'i kha dog dang dbyibs dmigs pa'i dus su de'i yan lag bzhin du rdzas dmigs pa can ni ma yin no //
analyzed: sngon po'i kha dog dang dbyibs dmigs pa'i dus su de'i yan lag bzhin du rdzas dmigs pa can ni ma yin no //
translated: When the color and shape of blue are observed, the substance is not observed as a part of that.

original: de bzhin du ser po la sogs pa'i kha dog dang dbyibs dmigs pa'i dus su don gzhan la dmigs pa ni yang dag pa ma yin par bstan par bya ba yin la /
analyzed: de bzhin du ser po la sogs pa'i kha dog dang dbyibs dmigs pa'i dus su don gzhan la dmigs pa ni yang dag pa ma yin par bstan par bya ba yin la /
translated: In the same way, when the color and shape of yellow and so on are observed, it is taught that the observation of another object is not real.

original: rjes su 'gro ldog dag kyang yin te /
analyzed: rjes su 'gro ldog dag kyang yin te /
translated: They are also concomitant and reverse concomitants.

original: de'i don gcig byed pa'i byed pa po nyid dam /
analyzed: de'i don gcig byed pa'i byed pa po nyid dam /
translated: They are the agent of a single object or

original: de sgra gcig gi brjod bya nyid yin yang don gzhan la sbyor ba dag gi ma yin te /
analyzed: de sgra gcig gi brjod bya nyid yin yang don gzhan la sbyor ba dag gi ma yin te /
translated: they are the object of a single term, but they are not applied to other objects.

original: de lta mod kyi de don gcig byed pa'i byed pa po nyid ni mang po rnams la yang gcig nyid kyi tha snyad kyi rgyu mtshan yin te /
analyzed: de lta mod kyi de don gcig byed pa'i byed pa po nyid ni mang po rnams la yang gcig nyid kyi tha snyad kyi rgyu mtshan yin te /
translated: However, the agent of a single object is the reason for the convention of a single unit even for many.

original: nags dang ba lang gi sgra la sogs pa yang rnam pa mang po yin par 'jig rten du snang ba yin te /
analyzed: nags dang ba lang gi sgra la sogs pa yang rnam pa mang po yin par 'jig rten du snang ba yin te /
translated: The terms forest and cow and so on are also seen in the world to be many aspects.

original: grangs dang / nags dang / dmag la sogs pa'i sgra rnams kyi brjod bya la /
analyzed: grangs dang / nags dang / dmag la sogs pa'i sgra rnams kyi brjod bya la /
translated: The terms ‚Äúnumber,‚Äù ‚Äúaggregation,‚Äù ‚Äúforest,‚Äù ‚Äúarmy,‚Äù and so on, are applied to their referents without distinction.

original: bye brag med par ltung ba'i phyir dang / don byed pa'i yul yin pa'i phyir yang /
analyzed: bye brag med par ltung ba'i phyir dang / don byed pa'i yul yin pa'i phyir yang /
translated: And because they are the objects of the activity of the mind,

original: grangs kyang bgrang bya la dgos pa nyid du nye bar blangs nas /
analyzed: grangs kyang bgrang bya la dgos pa nyid du nye bar blangs nas /
translated: number is also taken up as a necessary object of enumeration.

original: mang po rnams la tshig mang por thal bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: mang po rnams la tshig mang por thal bar 'gyur ro //
translated: It follows that many words are used for many things.

original: rdzas bzhin du grangs la sogs pa la yang kha dog dang dbyibs las tha dad pa can ma yin te /
analyzed: rdzas bzhin du grangs la sogs pa la yang kha dog dang dbyibs las tha dad pa can ma yin te /
translated: Like substance, number and so on are not separate from color and shape,

original: de 'dzin pa'i mngon sum la de dang 'dra ba'i snang ba med pa'i phyir yod pa ma yin te /
analyzed: de 'dzin pa'i mngon sum la de dang 'dra ba'i snang ba med pa'i phyir yod pa ma yin te /
translated: because there is no appearance of them in the direct perception that apprehends them.

original: rgyu mtshan de dag nyid tha dad par rnam par 'byed pa dang / tshig gi dbye ba @64b la sogs pa rnams ni brjod par 'dod pa'i yul la rnam par gnas pa yin no //
analyzed: rgyu mtshan de dag nyid tha dad par rnam par 'byed pa dang / tshig gi dbye ba @64b la sogs pa rnams ni brjod par 'dod pa'i yul la rnam par gnas pa yin no //
translated: For those very reasons, the distinctions of difference, the divisions of words, and so on, are based on the object that is intended to be expressed.

original: kha dog dang dbyibs ni tha dad par mi dmigs pa yin la /
analyzed: kha dog dang dbyibs ni tha dad par mi dmigs pa yin la /
translated: Color and shape are not observed as different.

original: phyis mngon sum gyi dus su de nyid dang / rjes su 'brel pa'i ngo bor ma yin nam /üîΩrjes su 'jug pa nyid kyi rdzas yin la /
analyzed: phyis mngon sum gyi dus su de nyid dang / rjes su 'brel pa'i ngo bor ma yin nam / rjes su 'jug pa nyid kyi rdzas yin la /
translated: Later, at the time of perception, is it not the very same substance that is related to the subsequent cognition?üîΩThe substance is the substratum of the subsequent cognition.

original: de nyid las log pa nyid kyi gnas skabs ni yon tan yin no snyam du sems la /
analyzed: de nyid las log pa nyid kyi gnas skabs ni yon tan yin no snyam du sems la /
translated: The state of being the substratum of the subsequent cognition is the quality.

original: de las tha dad pa'i rdzas gzhan zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: de las tha dad pa'i rdzas gzhan zhes bya ba'o //
translated: This is what they think.

original: de'i rjes su 'gro ba'i ngo bor rdzas ma yin nam /
analyzed: de'i rjes su 'gro ba'i ngo bor rdzas ma yin nam /
translated: The substance is different from the quality.

original: dbyibs dang kha dog gi rten yin la /
analyzed: dbyibs dang kha dog gi rten yin la /
translated: The substance is the substratum of shape and color.

original: de la brten pa de dag ni kun du dmigs pa yin pa'i phyir la de bzhin du ma dmigs pa yang grub pa yin no snyam du sems pas /
analyzed: de la brten pa de dag ni kun du dmigs pa yin pa'i phyir la de bzhin du ma dmigs pa yang grub pa yin no snyam du sems pas /
translated: Since shape and color are perceived only when the substance is perceived, and are not perceived when the substance is not perceived, the substance is the substratum of shape and color.

original: 'on te kha dog dang dbyibs dang ldan pa'i rdzas yin no zhe na /
analyzed: 'on te kha dog dang dbyibs dang ldan pa'i rdzas yin no zhe na /
translated: But if the substance has shape and color,

original: lan du ma yin te /
analyzed: lan du ma yin te /
translated: the answer is no.

original: de las tha dad par zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: de las tha dad par zhes bya ba ste /
translated: The substance is different from shape and color.

original: ljang gu dang ser po'i kha dog dang de'i dbyibs su snang ba'i dus su snang ba yin no //
analyzed: ljang gu dang ser po'i kha dog dang de'i dbyibs su snang ba'i dus su snang ba yin no //
translated: When the substance is perceived as green or yellow, it is perceived as having the shape and color of a pot.

original: sngar mthong ba ngo shes pa yang mthong ba'i yul la yin la /
analyzed: sngar mthong ba ngo shes pa yang mthong ba'i yul la yin la /
translated: The recognition of what was previously seen is also with respect to the object seen.

original: de'i yul dang log par 'dzin pa'i phyir mthong ba nyid kyis gnod pa yin no //
analyzed: de'i yul dang log par 'dzin pa'i phyir mthong ba nyid kyis gnod pa yin no //
translated: And because its object is grasped wrongly, it is contradicted by the very seeing.

original: gnod par byed pa las kyang khyad par gyi rnam pa'i nges pa ma bzung ba'i khyad par tsam mam /
analyzed: gnod par byed pa las kyang khyad par gyi rnam pa'i nges pa ma bzung ba'i khyad par tsam mam /
translated: And from the contradictor, the mere difference is seen, without the ascertainment of a specific form.

original: thag ring ba nyid kyang snang ba yin gyi rdzas sam cig shos ni ma yin no //
analyzed: thag ring ba nyid kyang snang ba yin gyi rdzas sam cig shos ni ma yin no //
translated: And distance itself is seen, not a substance or the other.

original: de'i gnas skabs na yod bzhin pa gnas skabs gzhan du 'gyur ba ma yin par bstan pa ni /
analyzed: de'i gnas skabs na yod bzhin pa gnas skabs gzhan du 'gyur ba ma yin par bstan pa ni /
translated: The existence of that at the time of its existence is not a transformation into another time is taught:

original: gsal ba dang mi gsal ba zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: gsal ba dang mi gsal ba zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /
translated: ‚ÄúThe manifest and the unmanifest, etc.‚Äù

original: snga ma'i kha dog dang dbyibs gzhan yin pa nyid dam /
analyzed: snga ma'i kha dog dang dbyibs gzhan yin pa nyid dam /
translated: The color and shape of the former are just different, or

original: gzhan du yang rtogs pa ni mi gsal ba nyid du tha snyad 'dogs pa med par thal bar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: gzhan du yang rtogs pa ni mi gsal ba nyid du tha snyad 'dogs pa med par thal bar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: the realization of the other is not the designation of the unmanifest. The meaning is that it follows that there is no designation of the unmanifest.

original: mthong ba dang phrad par byed pa mthong ba ni tshad ma yin /
analyzed: mthong ba dang phrad par byed pa mthong ba ni tshad ma yin /
translated: Seeing and making contact are seen as valid cognition.

original: phrad par byed pa yang reg pa'i dbang pos 'dzin pa ma yin nam /
analyzed: phrad par byed pa yang reg pa'i dbang pos 'dzin pa ma yin nam /
translated: And is it not the case that the faculty of touch apprehends that which is contacted?

original: de'i phyir mthong ba dang reg pa dag gis don gcig 'dzin pa yin pa'i phyir gzugs dang re bya la sogs pa gcig pu ni dzas yin te /
analyzed: de'i phyir mthong ba dang reg pa dag gis don gcig 'dzin pa yin pa'i phyir gzugs dang re bya la sogs pa gcig pu ni dzas yin te /
translated: Therefore, since seeing and touching apprehend the same object, form and tactility are the same.

original: de med na mngon sum nyid tshad ma nyid du mi 'gyu ro snyam du sems pas /
analyzed: de med na mngon sum nyid tshad ma nyid du mi 'gyu ro snyam du sems pas /
translated: If they were not the same, then perception would not be a valid cognition.

original: 'on te yang kha dog de ni thob pa mi zhes bya ba'o //üîΩlan ni / de nyid du na gal te de //
analyzed: 'on te yang kha dog de ni thob pa mi zhes bya ba'o // lan ni / de nyid du na gal te de //
translated: But if you say that color is the object of the eye faculty,

original: zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba'o //
translated: then the opponent‚Äôs response is stated in the lines:üîΩ‚ÄúIf that were so, then it would follow that . . .‚Äù

original: ji ltar yang mthong ba la gzugs dang dbyibs kyang snang ba yin la /
analyzed: ji ltar yang mthong ba la gzugs dang dbyibs kyang snang ba yin la /
translated: Just as in seeing, both form and shape appear,

original: rdzas kyang @65a * //
analyzed: rdzas kyang @65a * //
translated: and

original: de'i rtogs bya yin pa'i phyir de kho na bzhin du snang bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de'i rtogs bya yin pa'i phyir de kho na bzhin du snang bar 'gyur ro //
translated: substance is also the object of that seeing, so it is with tactility.

original: de bzhin du reg pas dmigs par bya ba yin na /
analyzed: de bzhin du reg pas dmigs par bya ba yin na /
translated: If tactility is the object of touch,

original: 'jam pa dang rtsub pa la sogs pa bzhin dang / de'i dpag bya kha dog dang dbyibs bzhin du de las gzhan pa'i rdzas su dmigs par 'gyur te /
analyzed: 'jam pa dang rtsub pa la sogs pa bzhin dang / de'i dpag bya kha dog dang dbyibs bzhin du de las gzhan pa'i rdzas su dmigs par 'gyur te /
translated: It would be like smoothness and roughness, and like the color and shape of that which is to be measured.

original: rang gi ngo bo de bzhin du ma dmigs pa la dmigs pa yin par smra bar mi rigs so zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: rang gi ngo bo de bzhin du ma dmigs pa la dmigs pa yin par smra bar mi rigs so zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: It is illogical to say that that which is not perceived as its own entity is perceived.

original: de lta yin na reg bya thob byed yin pas mthong ba ji ltar tshad ma yin snyam du sems pa la /
analyzed: de lta yin na reg bya thob byed yin pas mthong ba ji ltar tshad ma yin snyam du sems pa la /
translated: If that were so, since the object of touch is obtained, how could seeing be valid cognition?

original: rjes su sbyor ba ni zhes bya ba smos te /
analyzed: rjes su sbyor ba ni zhes bya ba smos te /
translated: The term ‚Äúapplication‚Äù is stated.

original: yul gzugs mthong ba ni thob bya rang gi 'bras bu'i ngo bo la de nyid la de'i 'bras bu nyid du sgro btags pas de nyid mthong ngo zhes mngon par zhen pas thob par bya ba yin la /
analyzed: yul gzugs mthong ba ni thob bya rang gi 'bras bu'i ngo bo la de nyid la de'i 'bras bu nyid du sgro btags pas de nyid mthong ngo zhes mngon par zhen pas thob par bya ba yin la /
translated: The object of seeing form is the object of touch, which is its own result. Since it is exaggerated to be the result of that, it is said that it is seen. Since it is conceived to be the object of touch, it is obtained.

original: reg bya la ni de dang tshogs pa gcig pa'i 'bras bu yin pa nyid kyis rnam par rtog pas sprul pa'i yul gcig pa nyid kyis tha snyad pa yin gyi rdzas ni yul ma yin te ;
analyzed: reg bya la ni de dang tshogs pa gcig pa'i 'bras bu yin pa nyid kyis rnam par rtog pas sprul pa'i yul gcig pa nyid kyis tha snyad pa yin gyi rdzas ni yul ma yin te ;
translated: In the case of tactile objects, they are conventionally the same because they are the effect of the same collection, and because they are imagined to be the same object. But they are not substantially the same object.

original: 'o na ci zhe na /
analyzed: 'o na ci zhe na /
translated: What is the reason?

original: yul ni gzugs dang reg bya dag yin te /
analyzed: yul ni gzugs dang reg bya dag yin te /
translated: The object is form and tactility,

original: de ltar nges pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de ltar nges pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because it is ascertained in that way.üîΩAnd it is said:

original: de yang / kha dog so sor snang ba las //
analyzed: de yang / kha dog so sor snang ba las //
translated: From the appearance of individual colors,

original: 'di ni bum min shes pa la //
analyzed: 'di ni bum min shes pa la //
translated: the cognition of this as a pot does not exist.

original: zhes gsungs pa'o //
analyzed: zhes gsungs pa'o //
translated: This is the intention of that statement.

original: 'di nyid kyi dgongs pas ni de 'dzin pa med na d'i shes pa med do zhes gsungs pa'o //
analyzed: 'di nyid kyi dgongs pas ni de 'dzin pa med na d'i shes pa med do zhes gsungs pa'o //
translated: If there is no apprehension of that, there is no cognition of it.

original: de ni rjes su 'gro ba'i mthar thug pa yin te /
