analyzed: mthong ba ni de dang 'brel pa can nyid rig pa ma yin no //
translated: seeing is not the awareness of that which is related to that.

original: goms pa yin na rjes su dpag pa yin no zhe na /
analyzed: goms pa yin na rjes su dpag pa yin no zhe na /
translated: If it is familiar, then it is inference.

original: de nyid med la de nyid kyi rtogs pa yin par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de nyid med la de nyid kyi rtogs pa yin par 'gyur ro //
translated: But it is not that, and it is the cognition of that.

original: ma goms pa'i dus su de yod par 'gyur pa yin no zhe na /
analyzed: ma goms pa'i dus su de yod par 'gyur pa yin no zhe na /
translated: If it is at the time of unfamiliarity, then it is that.

original: de lta yin na shi zin pa'i khim  bya yang sgra sgrogs par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de lta yin na shi zin pa'i khim  bya yang sgra sgrogs par 'gyur ro //
translated: If that is so, then even a dead crow would caw.

original: gang gi tshe de yod pa de'i tshe de rig pa yin gyi gzhan gyi tshe ji ltar yin /
analyzed: gang gi tshe de yod pa de'i tshe de rig pa yin gyi gzhan gyi tshe ji ltar yin /
translated: When it exists, then it is the cognition of that, but how is it otherwise?

original: des 'phags pa'i sbyangs pas mthong ba ni de rig pa yin no zhe na /
analyzed: des 'phags pa'i sbyangs pas mthong ba ni de rig pa yin no zhe na /
translated: The cognition of that is the seeing of the noble one through training.

original: ma yin te /
analyzed: ma yin te /
translated: No, it is not.

original: yul ma yin pa la mi 'jug pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: yul ma yin pa la mi 'jug pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because it does not engage with what is not an object.

original: gzhan du na goms pa la du ba las thag ring ba'i me ni rjes su dpag pas rtogs pa yin te /
analyzed: gzhan du na goms pa la du ba las thag ring ba'i me ni rjes su dpag pas rtogs pa yin te /
translated: Otherwise, fire far from smoke is realized by inference,

original: goms pa la ni mngon sum gyis yin no //
analyzed: goms pa la ni mngon sum gyis yin no //
translated: but when it is familiar, it is by direct perception.

original: 'di nyid ni de dang 'brel pa can nyid nye ba yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: 'di nyid ni de dang 'brel pa can nyid nye ba yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: This is because it is related to that and is near.

original: rjes su dpag pa la yang mtshungs pa yin par brjod do //
analyzed: rjes su dpag pa la yang mtshungs pa yin par brjod do //
translated: It is said to be the same for inference as well.

original: du ba pa'i ngo bo ni me'i bskyed bya yin gyi /
analyzed: du ba pa'i ngo bo ni me'i bskyed bya yin gyi /
translated: The nature of smoke is the effect of fire,

original: goms pa la ni mthong bas nges pa yin yang me'i ngo bo ni ma yin no //
analyzed: goms pa la ni mthong bas nges pa yin yang me'i ngo bo ni ma yin no //
translated: but it is not the nature of fire.

original: de bzhin du 'di la yang don byed pas bskyed bya'am /
analyzed: de bzhin du 'di la yang don byed pas bskyed bya'am /
translated: In the same way, here, one would have to see the nature of the effect or the nature of the cause in order to have the idea of the effect or the cause.üîΩBut if one has the idea of the effect or the cause through the mere fact of seeing the effect or the cause, one does not have the idea of the causal relation.

original: skyed byed kyi ngo bo mthong ba nyid kho na las @73b goms pa yin na /üîΩdon byed par nges pa ma yin pa la skyon med do //
analyzed: skyed byed kyi ngo bo mthong ba nyid kho na las @73b goms pa yin na / don byed par nges pa ma yin pa la skyon med do //
translated: If one has the idea of the causal relation, it is not through the mere fact of seeing the effect or the cause.

original: rtogs pa med na ji ltar nges pa yin /üîΩma yin te /
analyzed: rtogs pa med na ji ltar nges pa yin / ma yin te /
translated: If one does not have the idea of the effect or the cause, how can one have the idea of the causal relation?

original: nges pa'i sgras ni yongs su gsal bar rjod par byed pa'i phyir ro //üîΩrjes su dpag pas ni don byed pa'i rang gi ngo bo nyid nges pa yin la /üîΩmthong bas ni de'i bskyed bya dang skyed byed kyang yin no zhes bya ba'i khyad par ro //
analyzed: nges pa'i sgras ni yongs su gsal bar rjod par byed pa'i phyir ro // rjes su dpag pas ni don byed pa'i rang gi ngo bo nyid nges pa yin la / mthong bas ni de'i bskyed bya dang skyed byed kyang yin no zhes bya ba'i khyad par ro //
translated: No, for the word ‚Äúidea‚Äù is used here in the sense of ‚Äúclear and distinct idea.‚ÄùüîΩInference gives us the idea of the causal relation, but not the idea of the effect or the cause.üîΩThe idea of the effect or the cause is produced by the perception of the effect or the cause.

original: rang gi ngo bo nges pa las rjes su dpag pa 'jug par byed pa yin la /
analyzed: rang gi ngo bo nges pa las rjes su dpag pa 'jug par byed pa yin la /
translated: Inference is produced by the idea of the effect or the cause.

original: rang gi ngo bo dang 'brel bar nges pa las ni mthong ba yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: rang gi ngo bo dang 'brel bar nges pa las ni mthong ba yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The meaning is: from the ascertainment in connection with its own nature, it is seen.

original: rjes su dpag pa la ni rang gi ngo bo 'dzin pa med do //
analyzed: rjes su dpag pa la ni rang gi ngo bo 'dzin pa med do //
translated: In inference, there is no apprehension of its own nature.

original: rang gi ngo bo las nges pa ni yod do zhe na /
analyzed: rang gi ngo bo las nges pa ni yod do zhe na /
translated: But there is ascertainment from its own nature.

original: 'di la yang rang gi ngo bo dang 'brel par nges pa yod pa'i phyir 'jug par byed pa nyid nyams pa ma yin no //
analyzed: 'di la yang rang gi ngo bo dang 'brel par nges pa yod pa'i phyir 'jug par byed pa nyid nyams pa ma yin no //
translated: Here too, because there is ascertainment in connection with its own nature, the function of engaging is not lost.

original: rnam par rtog pa med kyang zhes bya ba ni rnam par rtog pa'i bag chags med par yang zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: rnam par rtog pa med kyang zhes bya ba ni rnam par rtog pa'i bag chags med par yang zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: Even without conceptualization means even without the latent tendencies of conceptualization.

original: ci las shes she na /
analyzed: ci las shes she na /
translated: From what is this known?

original: goms pa med pa gang yin pa der zhes bya ba smos so //
analyzed: goms pa med pa gang yin pa der zhes bya ba smos so //
translated: It is stated: That which is without habituation.

original: rjes su dpag pa ni rnam par rtog pa kho na ma yin nam /
analyzed: rjes su dpag pa ni rnam par rtog pa kho na ma yin nam /
translated: Isn't inference only conceptual?

original: de'i phyir der rjes su dpag pa nyid ces bya ba ji ltar lan yin /
analyzed: de'i phyir der rjes su dpag pa nyid ces bya ba ji ltar lan yin /
translated: Therefore, how can it is inference there be a response?

original: 'di skad bstan par 'gyur te /
analyzed: 'di skad bstan par 'gyur te /
translated: This is taught:

original: de nyid 'dzin pa'i rnam par rtog pa yin gyi /
analyzed: de nyid 'dzin pa'i rnam par rtog pa yin gyi /
translated: It is a conceptualization that apprehends that itself.

original: de nyid yod pa ni ma yin la 'jug par byed pa yang ma yin te /
analyzed: de nyid yod pa ni ma yin la 'jug par byed pa yang ma yin te /
translated: It does not exist, nor does it engage,

original: yul thob pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: yul thob pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because the object has been obtained.

original: de yang gzung ba la 'dzin pa'i phyir zhes bstan pa yin no //
analyzed: de yang gzung ba la 'dzin pa'i phyir zhes bstan pa yin no //
translated: And that is taught to be the apprehension of the apprehended.

original: des na de'i nus pas mthong ba spangs pa ni ma yin te /
analyzed: des na de'i nus pas mthong ba spangs pa ni ma yin te /
translated: Therefore, the seen is not abandoned by the power of that,

original: des na goms pa la yang rnam par rtog pa ni 'jug par byed pa ma yin pa'i phyir rnam par rtog pa ni nus pa can ma yin no //
analyzed: des na goms pa la yang rnam par rtog pa ni 'jug par byed pa ma yin pa'i phyir rnam par rtog pa ni nus pa can ma yin no //
translated: because even when it is cultivated, conceptualization does not engage. Therefore conceptualization is not powerful.

original: ma goms pa la ni rjes su dpag pa la ltos nas gzhan du yang de nyid min zhes bya ba'i mi rigs te /
analyzed: ma goms pa la ni rjes su dpag pa la ltos nas gzhan du yang de nyid min zhes bya ba'i mi rigs te /
translated: For one who is not familiar with it, it is unreasonable to say that it is not real in another way, depending on inference.

original: mthong ba dang rjes su dpag pa dag gi yul ni tha dad pa yin pa'i phyir blo nyid 'jug par byed pa'i phyir tshad ma yin no //
analyzed: mthong ba dang rjes su dpag pa dag gi yul ni tha dad pa yin pa'i phyir blo nyid 'jug par byed pa'i phyir tshad ma yin no //
translated: Because the objects of seeing and inference are different, the mind itself engages, and therefore it is valid knowledge.

original: mi bslu ba can nyid tshad ma nyid du bstan pa yin nam /
analyzed: mi bslu ba can nyid tshad ma nyid du bstan pa yin nam /
translated: Is non-deceptive-ness taught to be valid knowledge?

original: de yang rnam par rtog pa ni ma yin te /
analyzed: de yang rnam par rtog pa ni ma yin te /
translated: And that is not conceptualization,

original: phrad pa dang phrad par byed pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: phrad pa dang phrad par byed pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because it is contact and that which causes contact.

original: snga ma dang phyi ma'i mthong bas yul du byas pa ni de dag nyid phrad par byed pa yin la /
analyzed: snga ma dang phyi ma'i mthong bas yul du byas pa ni de dag nyid phrad par byed pa yin la /
translated: The object of the prior and subsequent seeing is the very thing that causes contact.

original: de dag gi gcig pa nyid ni rnam par rtog pas yin no //üîΩblo'i ni ma thob pa'i don byed pa'i ngo bo thob par byed pa'i phyir tshad ma nyid yin par bstan @74a * //
analyzed: de dag gi gcig pa nyid ni rnam par rtog pas yin no // blo'i ni ma thob pa'i don byed pa'i ngo bo thob par byed pa'i phyir tshad ma nyid yin par bstan @74a * //
translated: And their identity is due to conceptualization.

original: par bya ba yin na /
analyzed: par bya ba yin na /
translated: If the cognition is taught to be valid knowledge because it causes the attainment of the nature of the object not yet attained,üîΩwhy is it taught that

original: 'jug la de gtso yin phyir dang // zhes ci'i phyir bstan /
analyzed: 'jug la de gtso yin phyir dang // zhes ci'i phyir bstan /
translated: it is the engagement, because that is primary?

original: 'jug par byed pa nyid ni gnas skabs ma yin te /
analyzed: 'jug par byed pa nyid ni gnas skabs ma yin te /
translated: Engagement is not a state,

original: de 'gegs par byed pa la yang de nyid rab tu bsgrub par bya ba yin no //
analyzed: de 'gegs par byed pa la yang de nyid rab tu bsgrub par bya ba yin no //
translated: and that very thing is to be established even in the case of obstruction.

original: bden te / mi bslu ba can nyid de kho na 'jug par byed pa yin na ni 'gyur gyi /
analyzed: bden te / mi bslu ba can nyid de kho na 'jug par byed pa yin na ni 'gyur gyi /
translated: It is true that if nondeceptive-ness itself were engagement, it would be so,

original: rnam par rtog pa la ni de med pa yin te /
analyzed: rnam par rtog pa la ni de med pa yin te /
translated: but conceptualization does not have that.

original: phrad pa dang phrad par byed pa yin pa'i phyir zhes bya ba'i bsams pas skyon med do //
analyzed: phrad pa dang phrad par byed pa yin pa'i phyir zhes bya ba'i bsams pas skyon med do //
translated: The intended meaning is that it is faultless because of being contact and causing contact.

original: de bstan pa ni /
analyzed: de bstan pa ni /
translated: The teaching of that is

original: de ltar na re zhig ces bya ba'o //
analyzed: de ltar na re zhig ces bya ba'o //
translated: thus, first of all, etc.

original: de nyid dam mi bslu ba'i rgyu mtshan 'jug par byed pa nyid ni rtog pa'i ngo bo'i 'bras bu'i yul gyi rnam par dbye bas go bar byed pa'i don du yul gyi rnam pa'i dbye bas shes gsungs pa yin no zhes kha cig zer ba ni dam pa
analyzed: de nyid dam mi bslu ba'i rgyu mtshan 'jug par byed pa nyid ni rtog pa'i ngo bo'i 'bras bu'i yul gyi rnam par dbye bas go bar byed pa'i don du yul gyi rnam pa'i dbye bas shes gsungs pa yin no zhes kha cig zer ba ni dam pa
translated: Some say: The meaning of the statement that consciousness is differentiated by the aspect of the object is that the aspect of the object is the cause of engaging the object and the aspect of the object is the cause of nondeception.

original: ma yin te /üîΩre zhig cig ni rnam par rtog pa las blo mtshan nyid mi mthun pa nyid ni tha snyad pa yin par bstan nas /
analyzed: ma yin te / re zhig cig ni rnam par rtog pa las blo mtshan nyid mi mthun pa nyid ni tha snyad pa yin par bstan nas /
translated: This is not theüîΩultimate.üîΩHaving taught that the mind is different from conception in terms ofüîΩits characteristics, he now teaches that the mind is different from conception

original: da ni mtshan nyid mi mthun pa gzhan rtogs pa tha dad pa'i blo nyid kyis kyang rnam par rtog pa las ni ma yin no //
analyzed: da ni mtshan nyid mi mthun pa gzhan rtogs pa tha dad pa'i blo nyid kyis kyang rnam par rtog pa las ni ma yin no //
translated: in terms of its being a different cognition.

original: 'di dag tsam du bsams pa yin te /
analyzed: 'di dag tsam du bsams pa yin te /
translated: This is the point.

original: de yang 'jug par byed par nyid kyi rgyu mtshan nam /
analyzed: de yang 'jug par byed par nyid kyi rgyu mtshan nam /
translated: The reason is that the mind is engaged by the aspect of the object.üîΩTheüîΩother is not the case.

original: cig shos kyang zhes bya ba ni 'dir skabs ma yin no //
analyzed: cig shos kyang zhes bya ba ni 'dir skabs ma yin no //
translated: This is the context.

original: yongs su bcad nas 'jug bzhin pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa la yang rgyu mtshan nyid rtogs par byed pa ni rnam par rtog pa la sogs pa las mtshan nyid mi mthun pa kho na yin par bsams te /
analyzed: yongs su bcad nas 'jug bzhin pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa la yang rgyu mtshan nyid rtogs par byed pa ni rnam par rtog pa la sogs pa las mtshan nyid mi mthun pa kho na yin par bsams te /
translated: Having fully ascertained, it engages, and so on.  The reason is that it is thought that the conceptual consciousness is only dissimilar to the defining characteristic of a valid cognition.

original: tshad ma gzhan dgag pa'i skabs nyid yin pa'i phyir zhes bya ba'i dgongs pas /
analyzed: tshad ma gzhan dgag pa'i skabs nyid yin pa'i phyir zhes bya ba'i dgongs pas /
translated: The intended meaning is that it is because it is the context of refuting other valid cognitions.

original: da ni rtogs pa'i 'bras bu zhes bya ba smos so //
analyzed: da ni rtogs pa'i 'bras bu zhes bya ba smos so //
translated: Now, he says, ‚ÄúThe effect of realization.‚Äù

original: gal te rnam par rtog pa ni snang bzhin pa'i don la snga ma nyid 'dzin par byed pa las 'jug pa ma yin pa'i phyir tshad ma nyid ma yin no //
analyzed: gal te rnam par rtog pa ni snang bzhin pa'i don la snga ma nyid 'dzin par byed pa las 'jug pa ma yin pa'i phyir tshad ma nyid ma yin no //
translated: If a conceptual consciousness does not engage by apprehending an object that appears as before, then it is not a valid cognition.

original: blo ni 'jug par byed pa nyid kyis tshad ma nyid yin pa'i phyir rnam par rtog pa las mtshan nyid mi mthun pa nyid yin na /
analyzed: blo ni 'jug par byed pa nyid kyis tshad ma nyid yin pa'i phyir rnam par rtog pa las mtshan nyid mi mthun pa nyid yin na /
translated: Since the mind is a valid cognition by virtue of engaging, it is dissimilar to a conceptual consciousness.

original: gang gi tshe 'jug par mi byed pa de'i tshe tshad mar mi 'gyur ro snyam du sems pas /
analyzed: gang gi tshe 'jug par mi byed pa de'i tshe tshad mar mi 'gyur ro snyam du sems pas /
translated: When it does not engage, it is not a valid cognition.

original: mtshan nyid mi mthun pa nyid gzhan rtogs par byed pa yang yul gyi rnam pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa la 'jug par bya ba yin par bstan pa ni /
analyzed: mtshan nyid mi mthun pa nyid gzhan rtogs par byed pa yang yul gyi rnam pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa la 'jug par bya ba yin par bstan pa ni /
translated: The statement that the cognition of a different object is also called the form of the object, etc., is to show that it is to be engaged.

original: 'jug par byed pa las ni tshad ma ma yin gyi zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: 'jug par byed pa las ni tshad ma ma yin gyi zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //
translated: The statement, ‚ÄúIt is not a valid cognition because it engages,‚Äù etc., is to show that.

original: gal te shes pa la yul gyi rnam pa yin na de yang yul bzhin du rtogs pa ma yin @74b pa'i ngo bor 'gyur ro zhes bya ba ni glen chen gyi gtam rgyud lta bu 'gegs par byed pa bstan pa ni /
analyzed: gal te shes pa la yul gyi rnam pa yin na de yang yul bzhin du rtogs pa ma yin @74b pa'i ngo bor 'gyur ro zhes bya ba ni glen chen gyi gtam rgyud lta bu 'gegs par byed pa bstan pa ni /
translated: If the form of the object is in the cognition, then it would be the nature of the object, not the cognition. This is like the story of the fool.

original: 'di'i yul gyi rnam pa lta bu zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: 'di'i yul gyi rnam pa lta bu zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The statement, ‚ÄúIt is like the form of the object,‚Äù is to show the refutation.

original: 'brel pa gang gis mig la sogs pa'i tshogs pas bskyed par bya ba'i shes pa ni yul nyid kyi rjes su byed pa ma yin nam /
analyzed: 'brel pa gang gis mig la sogs pa'i tshogs pas bskyed par bya ba'i shes pa ni yul nyid kyi rjes su byed pa ma yin nam /
translated: By what connection is the cognition that is produced by the collection of the eye, etc., not a subsequent state of the object itself?

original: mig la sogs pa'i ni ma yin no //
analyzed: mig la sogs pa'i ni ma yin no //
translated: It is not a subsequent state of the eye, etc.

original: bu ni za ba bor nas pha ma dag gi rjes su byed pa lta bu'o //
analyzed: bu ni za ba bor nas pha ma dag gi rjes su byed pa lta bu'o //
translated: It is like a son who abandons his father and mother and becomes a subsequent state of his food.

original: des ni yul nyid 'dzin par byed pa yin no //
analyzed: des ni yul nyid 'dzin par byed pa yin no //
translated: It is the apprehender of the object itself.

original: de bzhin du dang po rnam par rig pa yin la /
analyzed: de bzhin du dang po rnam par rig pa yin la /
translated: Likewise, first there is consciousness,

original: de nas yul rig par byed pa'am /
analyzed: de nas yul rig par byed pa'am /
translated: and then there is the object of consciousness,

original: rnam par rig par byed pa nyid kyang rung /
analyzed: rnam par rig par byed pa nyid kyang rung /
translated: or consciousness is the object of consciousness.

original: de rig par byed pa yin pa'i phyir gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pas dub ba dang nye bar btags pa yang spangs pa yin te /
analyzed: de rig par byed pa yin pa'i phyir gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pas dub ba dang nye bar btags pa yang spangs pa yin te /
translated: Since it is the object of consciousness, the fault of infinite regress is avoided, and the fault of indirect designation is also avoided.

original: brgyud pa'am nye bar btags ba nan gyis sgro 'dogs pa 'ga' yang med de /
analyzed: brgyud pa'am nye bar btags ba nan gyis sgro 'dogs pa 'ga' yang med de /
translated: There is no indirect designation or infinite regress at all.

original: de lta mod kyi dngos po'i nyams su myong ba la dpyod par byed pa yin no //
analyzed: de lta mod kyi dngos po'i nyams su myong ba la dpyod par byed pa yin no //
translated: However, we do analyze the experience of things.

original: sngon po ni bde ba bzhin du rang rig par byed pas rtogs pa yin gyi /
analyzed: sngon po ni bde ba bzhin du rang rig par byed pas rtogs pa yin gyi /
translated: Blue is like pleasure in that it is self-cognized and thus cognized,

original: gzhan gyis ni ma yin te mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gzhan gyis ni ma yin te mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro //
translated: but it is not cognized by another consciousness because that would be unobservable.

original: des na de'i shugs las de nyid yul rig par byed pa kho bo cag smra'o //
analyzed: des na de'i shugs las de nyid yul rig par byed pa kho bo cag smra'o //
translated: Therefore, we say that the object of consciousness is that very blue by implication.

original: yul dang 'dra ba nyid ces bya ba ji ltar yin /
analyzed: yul dang 'dra ba nyid ces bya ba ji ltar yin /
translated: How can it be similar to the object?

original: 'dra ba'i phyir rnam par shes pa'i yul la 'dzin par byed pa ma yin te thal ches pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: 'dra ba'i phyir rnam par shes pa'i yul la 'dzin par byed pa ma yin te thal ches pa'i phyir ro //
translated: It is not the apprehender of the object of consciousness, because it is similar to it, otherwise, it would follow that it would be the apprehender of everything.

original: gzugs kyi shes pa ni reg bya la tshad mar mi 'gyur te mi 'dra ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gzugs kyi shes pa ni reg bya la tshad mar mi 'gyur te mi 'dra ba'i phyir ro //
translated: The consciousness of form is not a valid cognition in regard to the object of touch, because it is not similar to it.

original: de'i phyir don ni 'di yin te /
analyzed: de'i phyir don ni 'di yin te /
translated: Therefore, the meaning is this:

original: gzugs kyi shes pa ni phrad bya yul gzugs sam reg bya las 'byung bas sngon po'o zhes bya ba'am me'o zhes bya bar de nyid yin par sgro 'dogs par byed pa yin no //
analyzed: gzugs kyi shes pa ni phrad bya yul gzugs sam reg bya las 'byung bas sngon po'o zhes bya ba'am me'o zhes bya bar de nyid yin par sgro 'dogs par byed pa yin no //
translated: The consciousness of form is the superimposition of the identity of blue or fire, because it arises from the object of form or touch that is contacted.

original: des bskyed par bya ba yin pa'i phyir nag pa'i bu la der shes pa lta bu dang / bregs pa las skyes pa'i skra la sogs pa bzhin du 'dra ba nyid la de nyid yin par bsam pa'i phyir skyon med do //
analyzed: des bskyed par bya ba yin pa'i phyir nag pa'i bu la der shes pa lta bu dang / bregs pa las skyes pa'i skra la sogs pa bzhin du 'dra ba nyid la de nyid yin par bsam pa'i phyir skyon med do //
translated: There is no fault, because it is like the cognition of a son of a dark woman, or like the cognition of hair, etc., that arises from a shaved head, because it is similar to that which produces it.

original: de'i phyir gang gi yul gyi rnam pa yin pa de ni yul gyi rnam pa yin no zhes bstan pa yin no //
analyzed: de'i phyir gang gi yul gyi rnam pa yin pa de ni yul gyi rnam pa yin no zhes bstan pa yin no //
translated: Therefore, it is taught: That which is the aspect of the object is the aspect of the object.

original: yul gyi rnam pa dang 'dra ba'i rnam pa gang gi yin pa de ni yul gyi rnam pa yin te /
analyzed: yul gyi rnam pa dang 'dra ba'i rnam pa gang gi yin pa de ni yul gyi rnam pa yin te /
translated: That which has an aspect that is like the aspect of the object is the aspect of the object.

original: yul gyi bskyed par bya ba nyid yin pa ni de nyid du sgro 'dogs pa'i rgyu mtshan yin zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: yul gyi bskyed par bya ba nyid yin pa ni de nyid du sgro 'dogs pa'i rgyu mtshan yin zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The cause of superimposition is the generation of the object itself.

original: shes pa ni gal te bdag nyid la gnas pa'i yul gyi rnam pas yul rig par byed pa yin na /
analyzed: shes pa ni gal te bdag nyid la gnas pa'i yul gyi rnam pas yul rig par byed pa yin na /
translated: If consciousness is made aware of the object by the aspect of the object that exists in itself,

original: yul gyi rnam pa ji ltar rig pa yin /
analyzed: yul gyi rnam pa ji ltar rig pa yin /
translated: how is the aspect of the object known?

original: @75a * // gzung bya'i rnam pa can ni 'dzin par byed pa ma yin la /
analyzed: @75a * // gzung bya'i rnam pa can ni 'dzin par byed pa ma yin la /
translated: The aspect of the object of apprehension is not the apprehender.
